>> When timer T3402 expires the normal tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only" or the combined tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only" is triggered;
[('When timer T3402 expires', 'when')] ----> the normal tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only" or the combined tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only" triggered
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before the message ATTACH COMPLETE has been received from the UE, the network shall locally abort the attach procedure, enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED and shall not resend the message ATTACH ACCEPT.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before the message ATTACH COMPLETE has been received from the UE', 'if')] ----> the network shall locally abort the attach procedure
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before the message ATTACH COMPLETE has been received from the UE, the network shall locally abort the attach procedure, enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED and shall not resend the message ATTACH ACCEPT.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before the message ATTACH COMPLETE has been received from the UE', 'if')] ----> the network shall enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before the message ATTACH COMPLETE has been received from the UE, the network shall locally abort the attach procedure, enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED and shall not resend the message ATTACH ACCEPT.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before the message ATTACH COMPLETE has been received from the UE', 'if')] ----> the network shall not resend the message ATTACH ACCEPT
>> If a new GUTI was assigned to the UE in the attach procedure, the MME shall consider both the old and the new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network or the EMM context which has been marked as detached in the network is released.
[('If a new GUTI was assigned to the UE in the attach procedure', 'if')] ----> the MME shall consider both the old and the new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network or the EMM context which has been marked as detached in the network is released
>> If the old GUTI was allocated by an MME other than the current MME, the current MME does not need to retain the old GUTI.
[('If the old GUTI was allocated by an MME other than the current MME', 'if')] ----> the current MME not need to retain the old GUTI
>> If the old GUTI is used by the UE in a subsequent attach message, the network may use the identification procedure to request the UE's IMSI.
[('If the old GUTI is used by the UE in a subsequent attach message', 'if')] ----> the network may use the identification procedure to request the UE's IMSI
>> If the ATTACH REQUEST message is received with a protocol error, the network shall return an ATTACH REJECT message with one of the following EMM cause values:
[('If the ATTACH REQUEST message is received with a protocol error', 'if')] ----> the network shall return an ATTACH REJECT message with one of the following EMM cause values
>> If a new GUTI was allocated in the ATTACH ACCEPT message, the network shall consider both the old and the new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network or the EMM context which has been marked as detached in the network is released.
[('If a new GUTI was allocated in the ATTACH ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the network shall consider both the old and the new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network or the EMM context which has been marked as detached in the network is released
>> If the old GUTI is used by the UE in a subsequent attach message, the network acts as specified for case a above.
[('If the old GUTI is used by the UE in a subsequent attach message', 'if')] ----> the network acts as specified for case a above
>> If one or more of the information elements in the ATTACH REQUEST message differ from the ones received within the previous ATTACH REQUEST message, the previously initiated attach procedure shall be aborted if the ATTACH COMPLETE message has not been received and the new attach procedure shall be progressed;
[('If one or more of the information elements in the ATTACH REQUEST message differ from the ones received within the previous ATTACH REQUEST message', 'if'), ('the ATTACH COMPLETE message not received', 'if'), ('the new attach procedure shall progressed', 'if')] ----> the previously initiated attach procedure shall aborted
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the ATTACH ACCEPT message shall be resent and the timer T3450 shall be restarted if an ATTACH COMPLETE message is expected.
[('if an ATTACH COMPLETE message is expected', 'if')] ----> the timer T3450 shall restarted
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the network shall continue with the previous attach procedure and shall ignore the second ATTACH REQUEST message.
[('If the information elements do not differ', 'if')] ----> then the network shall ignore the second ATTACH REQUEST message
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the network shall continue with the previous attach procedure and shall ignore the second ATTACH REQUEST message.
[('If the information elements do not differ', 'if')] ----> then the network shall continue with the previous attach procedure
>> If an ATTACH REQUEST message is received in state EMM-REGISTERED the network may initiate the EMM common procedures; if it turned out that the ATTACH REQUEST message was sent by a genuine UE that has already been attached, the EMM context, EPS bearer contexts, if any, are deleted and the new ATTACH REQUEST is progressed.
[('if any', 'if')] ----> the EMM context , EPS bearer contexts deleted
>> If an ATTACH REQUEST message is received in state EMM-REGISTERED the network may initiate the EMM common procedures; if it turned out that the ATTACH REQUEST message was sent by a genuine UE that has already been attached, the EMM context, EPS bearer contexts, if any, are deleted and the new ATTACH REQUEST is progressed.
[('If an ATTACH REQUEST message is received in state EMM-REGISTERED', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures
>> If EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME, the MME receives an ATTACH REQUEST message with an ESM message included in the ESM message container information element, and the ESM sublayer in the MME detects a message error according to clause 7, the MME may decide to proceed with the attach procedure or to reject it.
[('If EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME , the MME receives an ATTACH REQUEST message with an ESM message included in the ESM message container information element', 'if')] ----> the MME may decide to proceed with the attach procedure or to reject it
>> When sending the ATTACH ACCEPT or ATTACH REJECT message to the UE, the MME shall include the ESM message provide by the ESM layer in the ESM message container information element.
[('When sending the ATTACH ACCEPT or ATTACH REJECT message to the UE', 'when')] ----> the MME shall include the ESM message provide by the ESM layer in the ESM message container information element
>> If the ATTACH REQUEST message is received with invalid or unacceptable UE security capabilities, the MME shall return an ATTACH REJECT message.
[('If the ATTACH REQUEST message is received with invalid or unacceptable UE security capabilities', 'if')] ----> the MME shall return an ATTACH REJECT message
>> The detach procedure with appropriate detach type shall be invoked by the UE if the UE is switched off, the USIM card is removed from the UE, the UE wishes to detach for EPS services, the UE wishes to detach for non-EPS services or as part of the eCall inactivity procedure defined in subclause 5.5.4.
[('if the UE is switched off the USIM card removed from the UE', 'if'), ('the UE wishes to detach for EPS services', 'if'), ('the UE wishes to detach for non - EPS services or as part of the eCall inactivity procedure defined in subclause 5.5.4', 'if')] ----> The detach procedure with appropriate detach type shall invoked by the UE
>> If the detach procedure is triggered due to USIM removal, the UE shall indicate "switch off" in the detach type IE.
[('If the detach procedure is triggered due to USIM removal', 'if')] ----> the UE shall indicate " switch off " in the detach type IE
>> When upper layers indicates that emergency bearer services are no longer required, the UE if still attached for emergency bearer services, may perform a detach followed by a re-attach to regain normal services, if the UE is in or moves to a suitable cell.
[('When upper layers indicates that emergency bearer services are no longer required', 'when'), ('if still attached for emergency bearer services', 'if'), ('if the UE is in or moves to a suitable cell', 'if')] ----> the UE may perform a detach followed by a re-attach to regain normal services
>> If a detach is requested by the HSS for a UE that has bearers for emergency services, the MME shall not send a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE, and shall follow the procedures in subclause 6.4.4.1 for a UE that has bearers for emergency services.
[('If a detach is requested by the HSS for a UE that has bearers for emergency services', 'if')] ----> the MME shall follow the procedures in subclause 6.4.4.1 for a UE that has bearers for emergency services
>> If a detach is requested by the HSS for a UE that has bearers for emergency services, the MME shall not send a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE, and shall follow the procedures in subclause 6.4.4.1 for a UE that has bearers for emergency services.
[('If a detach is requested by the HSS for a UE that has bearers for emergency services', 'if')] ----> the MME shall not send a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE
>> If the detach procedure for EPS services is performed, the EPS bearer context, if any, for this particular UE are deactivated locally without peer-to-peer signalling between the UE and the MME.
[('If the detach procedure for EPS services is performed', 'if')] ----> the EPS bearer context , if any , for this particular UE deactivated locally without peer-to-peer signalling between the UE and the MME
>> If the UE supports A/Gb mode or Iu mode or both, the UE shall store the TIN in the non-volatile memory in the ME, as described in annex C, for a subsequent attach procedure.
[('If the UE supports A/Gb mode or Iu mode or both', 'if')] ----> the UE shall store the TIN in the non-volatile memory in the ME as described in annex C for a subsequent attach procedure
>> The detach procedure is initiated by the UE by sending a DETACH REQUEST message.
[('by sending a DETACH REQUEST message', 'by')] ----> The detach procedure initiated by the UE
>> If the UE has a mapped EPS security context as the current EPS security context, the UE shall set the type of security context flag to "mapped security context".
[('If the UE has a mapped EPS security context as the current EPS security context', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the type of security context flag to " mapped security context
>> If the UE has a valid GUTI, the UE shall populate the EPS mobile identity IE with the valid GUTI.
[('If the UE has a valid GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall populate the EPS mobile identity IE with the valid GUTI
>> If the UE does not have a valid GUTI, the UE shall populate the EPS mobile identity IE with its IMSI.
[('If the UE does not have a valid GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall populate the EPS mobile identity IE with its IMSI
>> If the UE does not have a valid GUTI and it does not have a valid IMSI, then the UE shall populate the EPS mobile identity IE with its IMEI.
[('the UE not have a valid GUTI', 'if'), ('it not have a valid IMSI', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall populate the EPS mobile identity IE with its IMEI
>> If the detach is not due to switch off and the UE is in the state EMM-REGISTERED or EMM-REGISTERED-INITIATED, timer T3421 shall be started in the UE after the DETACH REQUEST message has been sent.
[('the detach is not due to switch off', 'if'), ('the UE is in the state EMM-REGISTERED or EMM-REGISTERED-INITIATED', 'if')] ----> timer T3421 shall started in the UE after the DETACH REQUEST message has been sent
>> If the detach type indicates that the detach is for non-EPS services or both EPS and non-EPS services, the UE shall enter the state MM IMSI DETACH PENDING.
[('If the detach type indicates that the detach is for non - EPS services or both EPS and non - EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state MM IMSI DETACH PENDING
>> If the UE to be switched off is not operating in NB-S1 mode and not operating in WB-S1 mode in any enhanced coverage CE mode, the UE shall try for a period of 5 seconds to send the DETACH REQUEST message.
[('the UE switched', 'if'), ('the UE not operating in NB-S1 mode', 'if'), ('the UE switched', 'if'), ('the UE not operating in WB-S1 mode in any enhanced coverage CE mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall try for a period of 5 seconds to send the DETACH REQUEST message
>> if the current EPS security context is a native EPS security context, then the UE shall store the current EPS security context as specified in annex C and mark it as valid;
[('if the current EPS security context is a native EPS security context', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall store the current EPS security context as specified in annex C
>> if the current EPS security context is a native EPS security context, then the UE shall store the current EPS security context as specified in annex C and mark it as valid;
[('if the current EPS security context is a native EPS security context', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall mark it as valid
>> else if the current EPS security context is a mapped EPS security context and a non-current full native EPS security context exists, then the UE shall store the non-current EPS security context as specified in annex C and mark it as valid, and finally the UE shall delete any mapped EPS security context or partial native EPS security context.
[('the current EPS security context is a mapped EPS security context', 'if'), ('a non-current full native EPS security context exists', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall store the non-current EPS security context as specified in annex C
>> else if the current EPS security context is a mapped EPS security context and a non-current full native EPS security context exists, then the UE shall store the non-current EPS security context as specified in annex C and mark it as valid, and finally the UE shall delete any mapped EPS security context or partial native EPS security context.
[('the current EPS security context is a mapped EPS security context', 'if'), ('a non-current full native EPS security context exists', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall mark it as valid
>> When the DETACH REQUEST message is received by the network, the network shall send a DETACH ACCEPT message to the UE, if the Detach type IE does not indicate "switch off".
[('When the DETACH REQUEST message is received by the network', 'when'), ('if the Detach type IE does not indicate " switch off "', 'if')] ----> the network shall send a DETACH ACCEPT message to the UE
>> Otherwise, the procedure is completed when the network receives the DETACH REQUEST message.
[('when the network receives the DETACH REQUEST message', 'when')] ----> Otherwise the procedure completed
>> The UE, when receiving the DETACH ACCEPT message, shall stop timer T3421.
[('when receiving the DETACH ACCEPT message', 'when')] ----> The UE shall stop timer T3421
>> If the detach procedure was performed due to disabling of EPS services, then the UE shall enter the EMM-NULL state.
[('If the detach procedure was performed due to disabling of EPS services', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall enter the EMM-NULL state
>> When the DETACH REQUEST message is received by the network, a DETACH ACCEPT message shall be sent to the UE, if the Detach type IE does not indicate "switch off".
[('When the DETACH REQUEST message is received by the network', 'when'), ('if the Detach type IE does not indicate " switch off "', 'if')] ----> a DETACH ACCEPT message shall sent to the UE
>> In WB-S1 mode, if access is barred for "originating signalling", the detach signalling procedure shall not be started.
[('if access is barred for " originating signalling "', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the detach signalling procedure shall not started
>> In NB-S1 mode, if access is barred for "originating signalling", the detach signalling procedure shall not be started.
[('if access is barred for " originating signalling "', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the detach signalling procedure shall not started
>> if the detach procedure was performed due to disabling of EPS services, the UE shall enter the EMM-NULL state;
[('if the detach procedure was performed due to disabling of EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the EMM-NULL state
>> if "EPS detach" was requested for reasons other than disabling of EPS services, the UE shall enter the EMM-DEREGISTERED state;
[('if " EPS detach " was requested for reasons other than disabling of EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the EMM-DEREGISTERED state
>> if "IMSI detach" was requested, the UE shall enter the EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE state and the MM-NULL state;
[('if " IMSI detach " was requested', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE state and the MM-NULL state
>> if "combined EPS/IMSI detach" was requested, the UE shall enter the EMM-DEREGISTERED state and the MM-NULL state.
[('if " combined EPS/IMSI detach " was requested', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the EMM-DEREGISTERED state and the MM-NULL state
>> If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the UE initiated detach procedure has been completed, this message shall be ignored and the UE initiated detach procedure shall continue.
[('the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the UE initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if'), ('If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the UE initiated detach procedure completed', 'if')] ----> this message shall ignored
>> If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the UE initiated detach procedure has been completed, it shall treat the message as specified in subclause 5.5.2.3.2 with the following modifications:
[('the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the UE initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if'), ('If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the UE initiated detach procedure completed', 'if')] ----> it shall treat the message as specified in subclause 5.5.2.3.2 with the following modifications
>> If the DETACH REQUEST message received by the UE contains detach type "re-attach required", and the UE initiated detach procedure is with detach type "EPS detach" or "combined EPS/IMSI detach", the UE need not initiate the attach or combined attach procedure.
[('the DETACH REQUEST message received by the UE contains detach type " re-attach required "', 'if'), ('the UE initiated detach procedure is with detach type " EPS detach " or " combined EPS/IMSI detach', 'if')] ----> the UE need not initiate the attach or combined attach procedure
>> If the DETACH REQUEST message received by the UE contains detach type "IMSI detach", and the UE initiated detach procedure is with detach type "EPS detach" or "combined EPS/IMSI detach", the UE shall progress both procedures.
[('the DETACH REQUEST message received by the UE contains detach type " IMSI detach "', 'if'), ('the UE initiated detach procedure is with detach type " EPS detach " or " combined EPS/IMSI detach', 'if')] ----> the UE shall progress both procedures
>> If the UE receives a message used in an EMM common procedure before the detach procedure has been completed, this message shall be ignored and the detach procedure shall continue.
[('If the UE receives a message used in an EMM common procedure before the detach procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> this message shall ignored
>> If the UE receives a message used in an EMM common procedure before the detach procedure has been completed, both the EMM common procedure and the detach procedure shall continue.
[('If the UE receives a message used in an EMM common procedure before the detach procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> both the EMM common procedure and the detach procedure shall continue
>> If a cell change into a new tracking area that is not in the stored TAI list occurs before the UE initiated detach procedure is completed, the detach procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure.
[('If a cell change into a new tracking area that is not in the stored TAI list occurs before the UE initiated detach procedure is completed', 'if')] ----> the detach procedure shall re-initiated after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure
>> If a cell change into a new tracking area that is not in the stored TAI list occurs before the UE initiated detach procedure is completed, the detach procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure.
[('If a cell change into a new tracking area that is not in the stored TAI list occurs before the UE initiated detach procedure is completed', 'if')] ----> the detach procedure shall aborted after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure
>> If the detach procedure was initiated due to removal of the USIM or the UE is to be switched off, the UE shall abort the detach procedure and enter the state EMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('the detach procedure initiated due to removal of the USIM or the UE', 'if'), ('the detach procedure the UE switched', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-DEREGISTERED
>> If the detach procedure was initiated due to removal of the USIM or the UE is to be switched off, the UE shall abort the detach procedure and enter the state EMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('the detach procedure initiated due to removal of the USIM or the UE', 'if'), ('the detach procedure the UE switched', 'if')] ----> the UE shall abort the detach procedure
>> If the current TAI is not in the TAI list, the detach procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure.
[('If the current TAI is not in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the detach procedure shall aborted after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure
>> If the current TAI is not in the TAI list, the detach procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure.
[('If the current TAI is not in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the detach procedure shall re-initiated after successfully performing a tracking area updating procedure
>> If the current TAI is still part of the TAI list, the UE shall restart the detach procedure.
[('If the current TAI is still part of the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the UE shall restart the detach procedure
>> If the UE receives a CS SERVICE NOTIFICATION message before the UE initiated combined detach procedure with detach type "IMSI detach" or "combined EPS/IMSI detach" has been completed, then this message shall be ignored and the UE initiated combined detach procedure shall continue.
[('the UE receives a CS SERVICE NOTIFICATION message before the UE initiated combined detach procedure with detach type " IMSI detach " or " combined EPS/IMSI detach " has been completed', 'if'), ('If the UE receives a CS SERVICE NOTIFICATION message before the UE initiated combined detach procedure with detach type " IMSI detach " or " combined EPS/IMSI detach " completed', 'if')] ----> then this message shall ignored
>> Timer T3421 shall be stopped if still running.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> Timer T3421 shall stopped
>> If the UE initiates a detach procedure in a CSG cell the CSG ID of which is not valid for the UE, and the detach procedure is not due to "switch off", the network shall proceed as follows:
[('the UE initiates a detach procedure in a CSG cell', 'if'), ('a detach procedure the CSG ID of which is not valid for the UE', 'if'), ('the detach procedure is not due to " switch off', 'if')] ----> the network shall proceed as follows
>> if the detach type is "IMSI detach" and the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services active, the MME shall send a DETACH ACCEPT message and deactivate all non-emergency EPS bearers, if any, by initiating an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure;
[('by initiating an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure', 'by'), ('the detach type is " IMSI detach "', 'if'), ('the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services active', 'if')] ----> the MME shall deactivate all non-emergency EPS bearers , if any
>> if the detach type is "IMSI detach" and the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services active, the MME shall send a DETACH ACCEPT message and deactivate all non-emergency EPS bearers, if any, by initiating an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure;
[('the detach type is " IMSI detach "', 'if'), ('the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services active', 'if')] ----> the MME shall send a DETACH ACCEPT
>> If the DETACH ACCEPT message could not be delivered due to an intra MME handover and the target TA is included in the TAI list, then upon successful completion of the intra MME handover the MME shall retransmit the DETACH ACCEPT message.
[('upon successful completion of the intra MME handover', 'upon'), ('the DETACH ACCEPT message could not delivered due to an intra MME handover', 'if'), ('the target TA included in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall retransmit the DETACH ACCEPT message
>> If a failure of the handover procedure is reported by the lower layer and the S1 signalling connection exists, the MME shall retransmit the DETACH ACCEPT message.
[('a failure of the handover procedure reported by the lower layer', 'if'), ('the S1 signalling connection exists', 'if')] ----> the MME shall retransmit the DETACH ACCEPT message
>> The network initiates the detach procedure by sending a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE.
[('by sending a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE', 'by')] ----> The network initiates the detach procedure
>> If the Detach type IE indicates "re-attach required" or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is not #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", or if the MME performs a local detach, the MME shall either store the current EPS security context if it is a native EPS security context, or the MME shall delete the current EPS security context if it is a mapped EPS security context.
[('if the MME performs a local detach', 'if'), ('if it is a native EPS security context', 'if'), ('the Detach type IE indicates " re-attach required " or " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('the EMM cause value is not # 2 " IMSI unknown', 'if')] ----> the MME shall store the current EPS security context
>> If the Detach type IE indicates "re-attach required" or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is not #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", or if the MME performs a local detach, the MME shall either store the current EPS security context if it is a native EPS security context, or the MME shall delete the current EPS security context if it is a mapped EPS security context.
[('if it is a mapped EPS security context', 'if')] ----> the MME shall delete the current EPS security context
>> If the detach type IE indicates "re-attach required" or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is not #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the network shall deactivate the EPS bearer context, if any, for the UE locally and enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED-INITIATED.
[('the detach type IE indicates " re-attach required " or " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('the EMM cause value is not # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the network shall deactivate the EPS bearer context , if any for the UE locally
>> If the detach type IE indicates "re-attach required" or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is not #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the network shall deactivate the EPS bearer context, if any, for the UE locally and enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED-INITIATED.
[('the detach type IE indicates " re-attach required " or " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('the EMM cause value is not # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the network shall enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED-INITIATED
>> When receiving the DETACH REQUEST message and the detach type indicates "re-attach required", the UE shall deactivate the EPS bearer context, if any, including the default EPS bearer context locally without peer-to-peer signalling between the UE and the MME.
[('When receiving the DETACH REQUEST message and the detach type indicates " re-attach required "', 'when'), ('if any', 'if')] ----> the UE shall deactivate the EPS bearer context including the default EPS bearer context locally without peer-to-peer signalling between the UE and the MME
>> The UE shall stop the timer T3346, if it is running.
[('if it is running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop the timer T3346
>> The UE shall also stop timer T3396, if it is running.
[('if it is running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall also stop timer T3396
>> When receiving the DETACH REQUEST message and the detach type indicates "IMSI detach", the UE shall not deactivate the EPS bearer context including the default EPS bearer context.
[('When receiving the DETACH REQUEST message and the detach type indicates " IMSI detach "', 'when')] ----> the UE shall not deactivate the EPS bearer context including the default EPS bearer context
>> A UE may send a DETACH ACCEPT message to the network, and shall re-attach to non-EPS services by performing the combined tracking area updating procedure according to subclause 5.5.3.3, sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with EPS update type IE indicating "combined TA/LA updating with IMSI attach".
[('performing the combined tracking area updating procedure according to subclause 5.5.3.3', 'by'), ('sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with EPS update type IE', 'by'), ('a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message indicating " combined TA/LA updating with IMSI attach', 'by')] ----> A UE shall re-attach to non - EPS services
>> If the UE is attached for EPS and non-EPS services, then the UE shall set the update status to U2 NOT UPDATED if, the Detach type IE indicates "re-attach required";
[('If the UE is attached for EPS and non - EPS services', 'if'), ('if , the Detach type IE indicates " re-attach required "', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the update status to U2 NOT UPDATED
>> If the UE is attached for EPS and non-EPS services, then the UE shall set the update status to U2 NOT UPDATED if, the Detach type IE indicates "re-attach not required" and no EMM cause IE is included.
[('If the UE is attached for EPS and non - EPS services', 'if'), ('the Detach type IE indicates " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('no EMM cause IE included', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the update status to U2 NOT UPDATED
>> When receiving the DETACH REQUEST message and the detach type indicates "re-attach not required" and no EMM cause IE, or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is not #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the UE shall deactivate the EPS bearer context, if any, including the default EPS bearer context locally without peer-to-peer signalling between the UE and the MME.
[('When receiving the DETACH REQUEST message', 'when'), ('the detach type indicates " re-attach not required " and no EMM cause IE , or " re-attach not required "', 'when'), ('the EMM cause value is not # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS', 'when')] ----> the UE shall deactivate the EPS bearer context , if any , including the default EPS bearer context locally without peer-to-peer signalling between the UE and the MME
>> If the detach type indicates "IMSI detach" or "re-attach required", then the UE shall ignore the EMM cause IE if received.
[('If the detach type indicates " IMSI detach " or " re-attach required "', 'if'), ('if received', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall ignore the EMM cause IE
>> If the detach type indicates "re-attach not required", the UE shall take the following actions depending on the received EMM cause value:
[('If the detach type indicates " re-attach not required "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall take the following actions depending on the received EMM cause value
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI and ciphering key sequence number and the GMM parameters GMM state, RAI, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, GPRS ciphering key sequence number and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI and ciphering key sequence number and the GMM parameters GMM state , RAI , P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , GPRS ciphering key sequence number and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to " re-attach not required "
>> For the EMM cause value #3 or #6, if the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when a DEREGISTRATION REQUEST is received over 3GPP access with the 5GMM cause with the same value, with de-registration type set to "re-registration not required" and with access type set to "3GPP access".
[('if the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> For the EMM cause value # 3 or # 6 the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the a DEREGISTRATION REQUEST is received over 3GPP access with the 5GMM cause with the same value , with de-registration type set to " re-registration not required " and with access type set to " 3GPP access "
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, RAI, PTMSI, P-TMSI signature, GPRS ciphering key sequence number and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state , RAI , PTMSI , P-TMSI signature , GPRS ciphering key sequence number and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to " re-attach not required "
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when a DEREGISTRATION REQUEST is received over 3GPP access with the 5GMM cause with the same value, with de-registration type set to "re-registration not required" and with access type set to "3GPP access".
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when a DEREGISTRATION REQUEST is received over 3GPP access with the 5GMM cause with the same value , with de-registration type set to " re-registration not required with access type set to " 3GPP access "
>> The UE shall store the PLMN identity in the "forbidden PLMN list" and if the UE is configured to use timer T3245 then the UE shall start timer T3245 and proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a.
[('if the UE is configured to use timer T3245', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall start timer T3245
>> The UE shall store the PLMN identity in the "forbidden PLMN list" and if the UE is configured to use timer T3245 then the UE shall start timer T3245 and proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a.
[('if the UE is configured to use timer T3245', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI and ciphering key sequence number and the GMM parameters GMM state, RAI, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, GPRS ciphering key sequence number, GPRS update status and GPRS attach attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI and ciphering key sequence number and the GMM parameters GMM state , RAI , P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , GPRS ciphering key sequence number , GPRS update status and GPRS attach attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to " re-attach not required "
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, RAI, PTMSI, P-TMSI signature, GPRS ciphering key sequence number, GPRS update status and GPRS attach attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state , RAI , PTMSI , P-TMSI signature , GPRS ciphering key sequence number , GPRS update status and GPRS attach attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 detach type set to " re-attach not required
>> If the UE is IMSI attached for non-EPS services, the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI, ciphering key sequence number and location update attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If the UE is IMSI attached for non - EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI , ciphering key sequence number and location update attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to " re-attach not required "
>> If the UE is IMSI attached for non-EPS services, the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI, ciphering key sequence number and location update attempt counter and as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If the UE is IMSI attached for non - EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI , ciphering key sequence number and location update attempt counter and as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to " re-attach not required "
>> The UE shall store the PLMN identity in the "forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service" list and if the UE is configured to use timer T3245 then the UE shall start timer T3245 and proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a.
[('if the UE is configured to use timer T3245', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall start timer T3245
>> The UE shall store the PLMN identity in the "forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service" list and if the UE is configured to use timer T3245 then the UE shall start timer T3245 and proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a.
[('if the UE is configured to use timer T3245', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, GPRS update status, RAI, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, GPRS ciphering key sequence number and GPRS attach attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state
>> If the cell where the UE has received the DETACH REQUEST message is a CSG cell and the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell are contained in the Allowed CSG list, the UE shall remove the entry corresponding to this CSG ID and associated PLMN identity from the Allowed CSG list.
[('If the cell where the UE has received the DETACH REQUEST message is a CSG cell and the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell are contained in the Allowed CSG list', 'if')] ----> the UE shall remove the entry corresponding to this CSG ID and associated PLMN identity from the Allowed CSG list
>> If the cell where the UE has received the DETACH REQUEST message is a CSG cell and the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell are contained in the Operator CSG list, the UE shall apply the procedures defined in 3GPP TS 23.122 [6] subclause 3.1A.
[('If the cell where the UE has received the DETACH REQUEST message is a CSG cell and the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell are contained in the Operator CSG list', 'if')] ----> the UE shall apply the procedures defined in 3GPP TS 23.122 [ 6 ] subclause 3.1A
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, GPRS update status and GPRS attach attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state
>> If the UE is IMSI attached for non-EPS services, the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status and location update attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to "re-attach not required".
[('If the UE is IMSI attached for non - EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status and location update attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when a DETACH REQUEST is received with the GMM cause with the same value and with detach type set to " re-attach not required "
>> The network shall stop timer T3422 upon receipt of the DETACH ACCEPT message.
[('upon receiving of the DETACH ACCEPT message', 'upon')] ----> The network shall stop timer T3422
>> If the Detach type IE indicates "IMSI detach", or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the network shall not change the current EMM state; otherwise the network shall enter state EMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('the Detach type IE indicates " IMSI detach " , or " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('the EMM cause value is # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the network shall not change the current EMM state
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall set the GPRS update status to GU2 NOT UPDATED and shall delete the GMM parameters P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI, GPRS ciphering key sequence number and shall enter the state GMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall delete the GMM parameters P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , RAI , GPRS ciphering key sequence number
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall set the GPRS update status to GU2 NOT UPDATED and shall delete the GMM parameters P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI, GPRS ciphering key sequence number and shall enter the state GMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the GPRS update status to GU2 NOT UPDATED
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall set the GPRS update status to GU2 NOT UPDATED and shall delete the GMM parameters P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI, GPRS ciphering key sequence number and shall enter the state GMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state GMM-DEREGISTERED
>> If the detach type is "IMSI detach", or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the network shall not change the current EMM state; otherwise the network shall change to state EMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('the detach type is " IMSI detach " , or " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('the EMM cause value is # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the network shall not change the current EMM state
>> If the detach type indicates "IMSI detach", or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value is #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the network shall not change the current EMM state; otherwise the network shall change to state EMM-DEREGISTERED.
[('the detach type indicates " IMSI detach " , or " re-attach not required "', 'if'), ('the EMM cause value is # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the network shall not change the current EMM state
>> If the network receives a DETACH REQUEST message with "switch off" indication, before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed, both procedures shall be considered completed.
[('If the network receives a DETACH REQUEST message with " switch off " indication', 'if')] ----> before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed shall considered completed
>> If the network receives a DETACH REQUEST message without "switch off" indication, before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed, the network shall send a DETACH ACCEPT message to the UE.
[('If the network receives a DETACH REQUEST message without " switch off " indication', 'if')] ----> before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed the network shall send a DETACH ACCEPT message to the UE
>> If the network receives an ATTACH REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure with detach type "re-attach not required" with no EMM cause IE, or "re-attach not required" and the EMM cause value not #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", has been completed, the network shall ignore the ATTACH REQUEST message.
[('If the network receives an ATTACH REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure with detach type " re-attach not required " with no EMM cause IE , or " re-attach not required " and the EMM cause value not # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS " , has been completed', 'if')] ----> the network shall ignore the ATTACH REQUEST message
>> If the Detach type IE, sent in DETACH REQUEST message, indicates "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or indicates "IMSI detach" and the network receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed, the network shall abort the detach procedure, shall stop T3422 and shall progress the tracking area updating procedure.
[('the Detach type IE , sent in DETACH REQUEST message indicates " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if'), ('the Detach type IE , sent in DETACH REQUEST message indicates " IMSI detach "', 'if'), ('the network receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> the network shall abort the detach procedure
>> If the Detach type IE, sent in DETACH REQUEST message, indicates "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or indicates "IMSI detach" and the network receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed, the network shall abort the detach procedure, shall stop T3422 and shall progress the tracking area updating procedure.
[('the Detach type IE , sent in DETACH REQUEST message indicates " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if'), ('the Detach type IE , sent in DETACH REQUEST message indicates " IMSI detach "', 'if'), ('the network receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> the network shall stop T3422
>> If the Detach type IE, sent in DETACH REQUEST message, indicates "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or indicates "IMSI detach" and the network receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed, the network shall abort the detach procedure, shall stop T3422 and shall progress the tracking area updating procedure.
[('the Detach type IE , sent in DETACH REQUEST message indicates " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if'), ('the Detach type IE , sent in DETACH REQUEST message indicates " IMSI detach "', 'if'), ('the network receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> the network shall progress the tracking area updating procedure
>> If the network receives a SERVICE REQUEST message or an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for packet services before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed and the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or detach type "IMSI detach", the network shall progress both procedures.
[('the network receives a SERVICE REQUEST message or an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for packet services before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if'), ('the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS " or detach type " IMSI detach "', 'if')] ----> the network shall progress both procedures
>> If the DETACH REQUEST message contains detach type "re-attach not required" with no EMM cause IE, or "re-attach not required" with EMM cause other than #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or detach type "re-attach required", the network shall progress the detach procedure.
[('If the DETACH REQUEST message contains detach type " re-attach not required " with no EMM cause IE , or " re-attach not required " with EMM cause other than # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS " or detach type " re-attach required "', 'if')] ----> the network shall progress the detach procedure
>> If the network receives an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for CS fallback, but not for CS fallback for emergency call, before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed and the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or detach type "IMSI detach", the network shall ignore the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message and progress the detach procedure.
[('If the network receives an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for CS fallback , but not for CS fallback for emergency call', 'if')] ----> before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed and the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS " or detach type " IMSI detach " the network shall ignore the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message
>> If the network receives an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for CS fallback, but not for CS fallback for emergency call, before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed and the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or detach type "IMSI detach", the network shall ignore the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message and progress the detach procedure.
[('If the network receives an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for CS fallback , but not for CS fallback for emergency call', 'if')] ----> before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed and the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS " or detach type " IMSI detach " the network shall progress the detach procedure
>> If the network receives an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for CS fallback for emergency call before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed and the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type "re-attach not required" with EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS" or detach type "IMSI detach", the network shall progress both procedures.
[('the network receives an EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message for CS fallback for emergency call before the network initiated detach procedure has been completed', 'if'), ('the DETACH REQUEST contains detach type " re-attach not required " with EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS " or detach type " IMSI detach "', 'if')] ----> the network shall progress both procedures
>> If the DETACH REQUEST message could not be delivered due to an intra MME handover and the target TA is included in the TAI list, then upon successful completion of the intra MME handover the MME shall retransmit the DETACH REQUEST message.
[('upon successful completion of the intra MME handover', 'upon'), ('the DETACH REQUEST message could not delivered due to an intra MME handover', 'if'), ('the target TA included in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall retransmit the DETACH REQUEST message
>> If a failure of the handover procedure is reported by the lower layer and the S1 signalling connection exists, the MME shall retransmit the DETACH REQUEST message.
[('a failure of the handover procedure reported by the lower layer', 'if'), ('the S1 signalling connection exists', 'if')] ----> the MME shall retransmit the DETACH REQUEST message
>> IMSI attach for non-EPS services when the UE is attached for EPS services.
[('when the UE is attached for EPS services', 'when')] ----> IMSI attach for non - EPS services
>> If control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the UE, a UE initiating the tracking area updating procedure in EMM-IDLE mode may request the network to re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts during the procedure.
[('If control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the UE', 'if')] ----> a UE initiating the tracking area updating procedure in EMM-IDLE mode may request the network to re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts during the procedure
>> If control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the UE, a UE initiating the tracking area updating procedure in EMM-IDLE mode may request the network to re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts associated with PDN connections established without control plane only indication during the procedure.
[('If control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the UE', 'if')] ----> a UE initiating the tracking area updating procedure in EMM-IDLE mode may request the network to re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts associated with PDN connections established without control plane only indication during the procedure
>> Whenever a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with the EMM cause #11 "PLMN not allowed" is received by the UE, the chosen PLMN identity shall be stored in the "forbidden PLMN list" and if the UE is configured to use timer T3245 then the UE shall start timer T3245 and proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a.
[('if the UE is configured to use timer T3245', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a
>> Whenever a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with the EMM cause #11 "PLMN not allowed" is received by the UE, the chosen PLMN identity shall be stored in the "forbidden PLMN list" and if the UE is configured to use timer T3245 then the UE shall start timer T3245 and proceed as described in subclause 5.3.7a.

>> In a shared network, if TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT is received as a response to a tracking area updating procedure initiated in EMM-CONNECTED mode, the UE need not update forbidden lists.
[('if TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT is received as a response to a tracking area updating procedure initiated in EMM-CONNECTED mode', 'if')] ----> In a shared network the UE need not update forbidden lists
>> The tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset when, a normal or periodic tracking area updating or a combined tracking area updating procedure is successfully completed;
[('when , a normal or periodic tracking area updating or a combined tracking area updating procedure is successfully completed', 'when')] ----> The tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset
>> The tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset when, a normal or periodic tracking area updating or a combined tracking area updating procedure is rejected with EMM cause #11, #12, #13, #14, #15, #25 or #35:
[('when , a normal or periodic tracking area updating or a combined tracking area updating procedure is rejected with EMM cause # 11 , # 12 , # 13 , # 14 , # 15 , # 25 or # 35', 'when')] ----> The tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset
>> The tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset when, a combined attach procedure or a combined tracking area updating procedure is completed for EPS services only with cause #2 or #18;
[('when , a combined attach procedure or a combined tracking area updating procedure is completed for EPS services only with cause # 2 or # 18', 'when')] ----> The tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset
>> Additionally the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset when the UE is in substate EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE-MM, and, a new tracking area is entered;
[('when the UE is in substate EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE-MM', 'when')] ----> the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset
>> Additionally the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset when the UE is in substate EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE-MM, and, timer T3402 expires;
[('when the UE is in substate EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE-MM', 'when'), ('timer T3402 expires', 'when')] ----> Additionally the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset
>> Additionally the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset when the UE is in substate EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE-MM, and, timer T3346 is started.
[('when the UE is in substate EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE-MM', 'when')] ----> Additionally the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be reset
>> When timer T3412 expires, the periodic tracking area updating procedure is started.
[('When timer T3412 expires', 'when')] ----> the periodic tracking area updating procedure started
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE detects entering a tracking area that is not in the list of tracking areas that the UE previously registered in the MME, unless the UE is configured for "AttachWithIMSI" as specified in 3GPP TS 24.368 [15A] or 3GPP TS 31.102 [17] and is entering a tracking area in a new PLMN that is neither the registered PLMN nor in the list of equivalent PLMNs;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE detects entering a tracking area that is not in the list of tracking areas that the UE previously registered in the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure unless the UE is configured for " AttachWithIMSI " as specified in 3GPP TS 24.368 [ 15A ] or 3GPP TS 31.102 [ 17 ] and is entering a tracking area in a new PLMN that is neither the registered PLMN nor in the list of equivalent PLMNs
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the periodic tracking area updating timer T3412 expires;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure the periodic tracking area updating timer T3412 expires
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE enters EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE and the UE's TIN indicates "P-TMSI";
[('when the UE enters EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE and the UE\'s TIN indicates " P-TMSI "', 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE performs an inter-system change from S101 mode to S1 mode and has no user data pending;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by'), ('when the UE performs an inter-system change from S101 mode to S1 mode', 'when'), ('when the UE has no user data pending', 'when')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE receives an indication from the lower layers that the RRC connection was released with cause "load balancing TAU required";
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE receives an indication from the lower layers that the RRC connection was released with cause " load balancing TAU required "', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE deactivated EPS bearer context locally while in EMM-REGISTERED, because it could not establish a NAS signalling connection, and then returns to EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE and no EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message, CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message or DETACH REQUEST message with detach type is "EPS detach" or "combined EPS/IMSI detach" is pending to be sent by the UE;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME and no EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message or DETACH REQUEST message with detach type is " EPS detach " or " combined EPS/IMSI detach "', 'by'), ('" combined EPS/IMSI detach " sent by the UE', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE changes the UE network capability information or the MS network capability information or both;
[('when the UE changes the UE network capability information or the MS network capability information or both', 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE changes the UE specific DRX parameter;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE changes the UE specific DRX parameter', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE receives an indication of "RRC Connection failure" from the lower layers and has no signalling or user uplink data pending;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE receives an indication of " RRC Connection failure " from the lower layers and has no signalling or user uplink data pending', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE enters S1 mode after 1xCS fallback or 1xSRVCC;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE enters S1 mode after 1x CS fallback or 1x SRVCC', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when due to manual CSG selection the UE has selected a CSG cell whose CSG identity and associated PLMN identity are not included in the UE's Allowed CSG list or in the UE's Operator CSG list;
[("when due to manual CSG selection the UE has selected a CSG cell whose CSG identity and associated PLMN identity are not included in the UE's Allowed CSG list or in the UE's Operator CSG list", 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE reselects an E-UTRAN cell while it was in GPRS READY state or PMM-CONNECTED mode;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE reselects an E-UTRAN cell while it was in GPRS READY state or PMM-CONNECTED mode', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE supports SRVCC to GERAN or UTRAN or supports vSRVCC to UTRAN and changes the mobile station classmark 2 or the supported codecs, or the UE supports SRVCC to GERAN and changes the mobile station classmark 3;
[('sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME when the UE supports SRVCC to GERAN or UTRAN or supports vSRVCC to UTRAN', 'by'), ('when the UE changes the mobile station classmark 2 or the supported codecs', 'by'), ('the UE supports SRVCC to GERAN', 'by'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME the UE changes the mobile station classmark 3', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE changes the radio capability for GERAN, or cdma2000® or both;
[('when the UE changes the radio capability for GERAN , or cdma2000® or both', 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE's usage setting or the voice domain preference for E-UTRAN change in the UE;
[("by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME , when the UE's usage setting or the voice domain preference for E-UTRAN change in the UE", 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME,
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE activates mobility management for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13], annex P.2, and the TIN indicates "RAT-related TMSI";
[('when the UE activates mobility management for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] , annex P.2 , and the TIN indicates " RAT-related TMSI "', 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE performs an inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode and the TIN indicates "RAT-related TMSI", but the UE is required to perform tracking area updating for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13], annex P.4;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure when the UE performs an inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode and the TIN indicates " RAT-related TMSI "
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, upon reception of a paging indication using S-TMSI and the UE is in state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE;
[('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by'), ('receiving of a paging indication using S-TMSI', 'upon'), ('the UE is in state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE', 'upon')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE needs to update the network with EPS bearer context status due to local de-activation of EPS bearer context as specified in subclause 6.5.1.4A;
[('when the UE needs to update the network with EPS bearer context status due to local de-activation of EPS bearer context as specified in subclause 6.5.1.4A', 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE needs to request the use of PSM or needs to stop the use of PSM;

>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when a change in the PSM usage conditions at the UE requires a different timer T3412 value or different timer T3324 value;
[('when a change in the PSM usage conditions at the UE requires a different timer T3412 value or different timer T3324 value', 'when'), ('by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME', 'by')] ----> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the CIoT EPS optimizations the UE needs to use, change in the UE;

>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the Default_DCN_ID value changes, as specified in 3GPP TS 24.368 [15A] or in USIM file NASCONFIG as specified in 3GPP TS 31.102 [17];

>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, in WB-S1 mode, when the applicable UE radio capability ID for the current UE radio configuration changes due to a revocation of the network-assigned UE radio capability IDs by the serving PLMN;

>> The UE in state EMM-REGISTERED shall initiate the tracking area updating procedure by sending a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to the MME, when the UE needs to use the WUS assistance, stop to use the WUS assistance, or change the conditions for using the WUS assistance.
