>> If the UE is in the EMM-CONNECTED mode and the UE changes the radio capability for E-UTRAN or for NG-RAN, the UE may locally release the established NAS signalling connection and enter the EMM-IDLE mode.
[('the UE is in the EMM-CONNECTED mode', 'if'), ('the UE changes the radio capability for E-UTRAN or for NG-RAN', 'if')] ----> the UE may enter the EMM-IDLE mode
>> If the UE is in the EMM-CONNECTED mode and the UE changes the radio capability for E-UTRAN or for NG-RAN, the UE may locally release the established NAS signalling connection and enter the EMM-IDLE mode.
[('the UE is in the EMM-CONNECTED mode', 'if'), ('the UE changes the radio capability for E-UTRAN or for NG-RAN', 'if')] ----> the UE may locally release the established NAS signalling connection
>> For case l, if the TIN indicates "RAT-related TMSI", the UE shall set the TIN to "P-TMSI" before initiating the tracking area updating procedure.
[('if the TIN indicates " RAT-related TMSI "', 'if')] ----> For case l the UE shall set the TIN to " P-TMSI " before initiating the tracking area updating procedure
>> If a UE is only using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization, the "signalling active" flag in the Additional update type IE shall be set to 1.
[('If a UE is only using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if')] ----> the " signalling active " flag in the Additional update type IE shall set to 1
>> If the UE has to request resources for ProSe direct discovery or Prose direct communication, then the UE shall set the "active" flag to 1 in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE has to request resources for ProSe direct discovery or Prose direct communication', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the " active " flag to 1
>> If the UE does not have any established PDN connection, and the inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode is not due to emergency services fallback, the "active" flag in the EPS update type IE shall be set to 0.
[('the UE not have any established PDN connection', 'if'), ('the inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode is not due to emergency services fallback', 'if')] ----> the " active " flag in the EPS update type IE shall set to 0
>> When the UE has user data pending and performs an inter-system change from S101 mode to S1 mode to a tracking area included in the TAI list stored in the UE, the UE shall perform a service request procedure instead of a tracking area updating procedure.
[('When the UE has user data pending', 'when'), ('When the UE performs an inter-system change from S101 mode to S1 mode to a tracking area included in the TAI list stored in the UE', 'when')] ----> the UE shall perform a service request procedure instead of a tracking area updating procedure
>> When initiating a tracking area updating procedure while in S1 mode, the UE shall use the current EPS NAS integrity key to integrity protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, unless the UE is performing inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode.
[('When initiating a tracking area updating procedure while in S1 mode', 'when')] ----> the UE shall use the current EPS NAS integrity key to integrity protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message unless the UE is performing inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode
>> In this case, when the UE enters E-UTRAN coverage and initiates a tracking area updating procedure, the UE shall not include the UE specific DRX parameter in the DRX parameter IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('when the UE enters E-UTRAN coverage', 'when'), ('when the UE initiates a tracking area updating procedure', 'when')] ----> In this case the UE shall not include the UE specific DRX parameter in the DRX parameter IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE supports eDRX and requests the use of eDRX, the UE shall include the extended DRX parameters IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('the UE supports eDRX', 'if'), ('the UE requests the use of eDRX', 'if')] ----> the UE shall include the extended DRX parameters IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE supports PSM and requests the use of PSM, the UE shall include the T3324 value IE with a requested timer value in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('the UE supports PSM', 'if'), ('the UE requests the use of PSM', 'if')] ----> the UE shall include the T3324 value IE with a requested timer value in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If a UE supporting CIoT EPS optimizations in NB-S1 mode initiates the tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only", the UE shall indicate "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE and shall set the EPS update type IE to "TA updating".
[('If a UE supporting CIoT EPS optimizations in NB-S1 mode initiates the tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only"', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the EPS update type IE to " TA updating "
>> If a UE supporting CIoT EPS optimizations in NB-S1 mode initiates the tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only", the UE shall indicate "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE and shall set the EPS update type IE to "TA updating".
[('If a UE supporting CIoT EPS optimizations in NB-S1 mode initiates the tracking area updating procedure for EPS services and "SMS only"', 'if')] ----> the UE shall indicate "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE
>> If the UE supports S1-U data transfer and multiple user plane radio bearers in NB-S1 mode, then the UE shall set the Multiple DRB support bit to "Multiple DRB supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE supports S1-U data transfer and multiple user plane radio bearers in NB-S1 mode', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the Multiple DRB support bit to " Multiple DRB supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE is in NB-S1 mode, then the UE shall set the Control plane CIoT EPS optimization bit to "Control plane CIoT EPS optimization supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE is in NB-S1 mode', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the Control plane CIoT EPS optimization bit to " Control plane CIoT EPS optimization supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE is capable of NB-N1 mode, then the UE shall set the Control plane CIoT 5GS optimization bit to "Control plane CIoT 5GS optimization supported" in the N1 UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE is capable of NB-N1 mode', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the Control plane CIoT 5GS optimization bit to " Control plane CIoT 5GS optimization supported " in the N1 UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE supports control plane MT-EDT, then the UE shall set the CP-MT-EDT bit to "Control plane Mobile Terminated-Early Data Transmission supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE supports control plane MT-EDT', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the CP-MT-EDT bit to " Control plane Mobile Terminated-Early Data Transmission supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE supports user plane MT-EDT, then the UE shall set the UP-MT-EDT bit to "User plane Mobile Terminated-Early Data Transmission supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE supports user plane MT-EDT', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the UP-MT-EDT bit to " User plane Mobile Terminated-Early Data Transmission supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the UE has to request resources for V2X communication over PC5, then the UE shall set the "active" flag to 1 in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE has to request resources for V2X communication over PC5', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the " active " flag to 1 in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If timer T3442 is currently running, the UE shall stop timer T3442.
[('If timer T3442 is currently running', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3442
>> For all cases except cases z and zd, if the UE supports neither A/Gb mode nor Iu mode, the UE shall include a valid GUTI in the Old GUTI IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('if the UE supports neither A/Gb mode nor Iu mode', 'if')] ----> For all cases except cases z and zd the UE shall include a valid GUTI in the Old GUTI IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> For all cases except cases z and zd, if the UE supports A/Gb mode or Iu mode or both, the UE shall handle the Old GUTI IE as follows:
[('if the UE supports A/Gb mode or Iu mode or both', 'if')] ----> For all cases except cases z and zd the UE shall handle the Old GUTI IE as follows
>> If the TIN indicates "P-TMSI" and the UE holds a valid P-TMSI and RAI, the UE shall map the P-TMSI and RAI into the Old GUTI IE, and include Old GUTI type IE with GUTI type set to "mapped GUTI".
[('the TIN indicates " P-TMSI "', 'if'), ('the UE holds a valid P-TMSI and RAI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall include Old GUTI type IE with GUTI type set to " mapped GUTI "
>> If the TIN indicates "P-TMSI" and the UE holds a valid P-TMSI and RAI, the UE shall map the P-TMSI and RAI into the Old GUTI IE, and include Old GUTI type IE with GUTI type set to "mapped GUTI".
[('the TIN indicates " P-TMSI "', 'if'), ('the UE holds a valid P-TMSI and RAI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall map the P-TMSI and RAI into the Old GUTI IE
>> Additionally, if the UE holds a valid GUTI, the UE shall indicate the GUTI in the Additional GUTI IE.
[('if the UE holds a valid GUTI', 'if')] ----> Additionally the UE shall indicate the GUTI in the Additional GUTI IE
>> If the TIN indicates "GUTI" or "RAT-related TMSI" and the UE holds a valid GUTI, the UE shall indicate the GUTI in the Old GUTI IE, and include Old GUTI type IE with GUTI type set to "native GUTI".
[('the TIN indicates " GUTI " or " RAT-related TMSI "', 'if'), ('the UE holds a valid GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall include Old GUTI type IE with GUTI type set to " native GUTI "
>> If the TIN indicates "GUTI" or "RAT-related TMSI" and the UE holds a valid GUTI, the UE shall indicate the GUTI in the Old GUTI IE, and include Old GUTI type IE with GUTI type set to "native GUTI".
[('the TIN indicates " GUTI " or " RAT-related TMSI "', 'if'), ('the UE holds a valid GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall indicate the GUTI in the Old GUTI IE
>> If a UE has established PDN connection and uplink user data pending to be sent via user plane when it initiates the tracking area updating procedure, or uplink signalling not related to the tracking area updating procedure when the UE does not support control plane CIoT EPS optimization, it may set the "active" flag in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to indicate the request to establish the user plane to the network and to keep the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure.

>> If a UE has established PDN connection and uplink user data pending to be sent via user plane when it initiates the tracking area updating procedure, or uplink signalling not related to the tracking area updating procedure when the UE does not support control plane CIoT EPS optimization, it may set the "active" flag in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to indicate the request to establish the user plane to the network and to keep the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure.

>> If a UE has established PDN connection and uplink user data pending to be sent via user plane when it initiates the tracking area updating procedure, or uplink signalling not related to the tracking area updating procedure when the UE does not support control plane CIoT EPS optimization, it may set the "active" flag in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to indicate the request to establish the user plane to the network and to keep the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure.

[('when it initiates the tracking area updating procedure ,', 'if')] ----> it may set the " active " flag in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to indicate the request to establish the user plane to the network and to keep the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure
>> If a UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and has user data pending to be sent via control plane over MME but no user data pending to be sent via user plane, or uplink signalling not related to the tracking area updating procedure, the UE may set the "signalling active" flag in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message to indicate the request to keep the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure.

>> For all cases except cases z and zd, if the UE has a current EPS security context, the UE shall include the eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.

>> If the UE has a current EPS security context, the UE shall integrity protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with the current EPS security context.
[('If the UE has a current EPS security context', 'if')] ----> the UE shall protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with the current EPS security context
>> When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode to perform an inter-system change from A/Gb mode or Iu mode to S1 mode and the TIN is set to "P-TMSI", the UE shall include the GPRS ciphering key sequence number applicable for A/Gb mode or Iu mode and a nonceUE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.

>> When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-CONNECTED mode to perform an inter-system change from A/Gb mode or Iu mode to S1 mode, the UE shall derive the EPS NAS keys from the mapped K'ASME using the selected NAS algorithms, nonceMME and KSISGSN provided by lower layers as indicated in 3GPP TS 33.401 [19].
[('When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-CONNECTED mode to perform an inter-system change from A/Gb mode or Iu mode to S1 mode', 'when')] ----> the UE shall derive the EPS NAS keys from the mapped K'ASME using the selected NAS algorithms , nonceMME and KSISGSN provided by lower layers as indicated in 3GPP TS 33.401 [ 19 ]
>> If the UE has a non-current native EPS security context, the UE shall include the KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE and its associated GUTI, as specified above, either in the Old GUTI IE or in the Additional GUTI IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE has a non-current native EPS security context', 'if')] ----> the UE shall include the KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE and its associated GUTI , as specified above either in the Old GUTI IE or in the Additional GUTI IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> For the case z, if upper layers have indicated that IMS signalling or IMS emergency signalling was already ongoing in N1 mode before performing the inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode, or if the inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode is due to emergency services fallback, the "active" flag in the EPS update type IE shall be set to 1.
[('if upper layers have indicated that IMS signalling or IMS emergency signalling was already ongoing in N1 mode before performing the inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode , or if the inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode is due to emergency services fallback', 'if')] ----> For the case z the " active " flag in the EPS update type IE shall set to 1
>> If the UE has a non-current native EPS security context, the UE shall include the KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the UE has a non-current native EPS security context', 'if')] ----> the UE shall include the KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode, the UE may also include an EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, indicating which EPS bearer contexts are active in the UE.
[('When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode', 'when')] ----> the UE may also include an EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message indicating which EPS bearer contexts are active in the UE
>> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, if the UE has established PDN connection of "non IP" or Ethernet PDN type;
[('if the UE has established PDN connection of " non IP " or Ethernet PDN type', 'if')] ----> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, if the UE, locally deactivated at least one dedicated EPS bearer context upon an inter-system mobility from WB-S1 mode to NB-S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode;
[('if the UE , locally deactivated at least one dedicated EPS bearer context upon an inter-system mobility from WB-S1 mode to NB-S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode', 'if')] ----> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, if the UE, locally deactivated at least one dedicated EPS bearer context upon an inter-system change from WB-N1 mode to NB-S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode for the UE operating in single-registration mode;
[('if the UE , locally deactivated at least one dedicated EPS bearer context upon an inter-system change from WB - N1 mode to NB-S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode for the UE operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message

[('if the UE , locally deactivated at least one default EPS bearer context upon an inter-system change from N1 mode to NB-S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode for the UE', 'if')] ----> The UE shall include the EPS bearer context status IE in TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message operating in single-registration mode

>> NOTE 4:	In NB-S1 mode, if a DRX parameter was included in the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, then the UE stores and uses the received DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode.

>> If the UE has included the DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, but did not receive a DRX parameter in the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE, or if the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE was not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, then the UE uses the cell specific DRX value in NB-S1 mode.

[('the UE not receive a DRX parameter in the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE uses the cell specific DRX value in NB-S1 mode
>> If the UE has included the DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, but did not receive a DRX parameter in the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE, or if the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE was not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, then the UE uses the cell specific DRX value in NB-S1 mode.
[('the Negotiated DRX parameter in NB-S1 mode IE not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> then the UE uses the cell specific DRX value in NB-S1 mode
