>> If an EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, the MME shall deactivate all those EPS bearer contexts locally which are in ESM state BEARER CONTEXT ACTIVE or BEARER CONTEXT MODIFY PENDING on the network side, but are indicated by the UE as being in ESM state BEARER CONTEXT INACTIVE.
[('If an EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if')] ----> the MME shall deactivate all those EPS bearer contexts locally which are in ESM state BEARER CONTEXT ACTIVE or BEARER CONTEXT MODIFY PENDING on the network side , but are indicated by the UE as being in ESM state BEARER CONTEXT INACTIVE
>> If a default EPS bearer context is marked as inactive in the EPS bearer context status IE included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, and this default bearer is not associated with the last remaining PDN connection of the UE in the MME, the MME shall locally deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the UE.
[('a default EPS bearer context marked as inactive in the EPS bearer context status IE included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if'), ('this default bearer not associated with the last remaining PDN connection of the UE in the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME shall locally deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the UE
>> If the default bearer is associated with the last remaining PDN connection of the UE in the MME, and EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME, the MME shall locally deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the UE.
[('If the default bearer is associated with the last remaining PDN connection of the UE in the MME , and EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME shall deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the UE
>> If the EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST, the MME shall include an EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, indicating which EPS bearer contexts are active in the MME except for the case no EPS bearer context exists on the network side.
[('If the EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST', 'if')] ----> the MME shall include an EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message indicating which EPS bearer contexts are active in the MME except for the case no EPS bearer context exists on the network side
>> If the EPS update type IE included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message indicates "periodic updating", and the UE was previously successfully attached for EPS and non-EPS services, subject to operator policies the MME should allocate a TAI list that does not span more than one location area.
[('If the EPS update type IE included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message indicates " periodic updating "', 'if'), ('the UE previously successfully attached for EPS and non - EPS services', 'if')] ----> subject to operator policies the MME should allocate a TAI list that does not span more than one location area
>> The MME shall indicate "combined TA/LA updated" or "combined TA/LA updated and ISR activated" in the EPS update result IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, if the following conditions apply:
[('if the following conditions apply', 'if')] ----> The MME shall indicate " combined TA/LA updated " or " combined TA/LA updated and ISR activated " in the EPS update result IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message
>> If the MME supports and accepts the use of PSM, and the UE included the T3412extended value IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, then the MME shall take into account the T3412 value requested when providing the T3412 value IE and the T3412 extended value IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('the MME supports the use of PSM', 'if'), ('the MME accepts the use of PSM', 'if'), ('the UE included the T3412extended value IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall take into account the T3412 value requested when providing the T3412 value IE and the T3412 extended value IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message
>> If the MME includes the T3324 value IE indicating a value other than deactivated in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, then the MME shall indicate in the EPS update result IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message that ISR is not activated.
[('If the MME includes the T3324 value IE indicating a value other than deactivated in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall indicate in the EPS update result IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message that ISR is not activated
>> Also, during the tracking area updating procedure without the "active" flag set, if the MME has deactivated EPS bearer context locally for any reason, the MME shall inform the UE of the deactivated EPS bearer context by including the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('if the MME has deactivated EPS bearer context locally for any reason', 'if'), ('by including the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'by')] ----> Also during the tracking area updating procedure without the " active " flag set the MME shall inform the UE of the deactivated EPS bearer context
>> Also, during the tracking area updating procedure with the "active" flag set, if the MME has deactivated EPS bearer context associated with control plane only indication locally for any reason, the MME shall inform the UE of the deactivated EPS bearer context by including the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('if the MME has deactivated EPS bearer context associated with control plane only indication locally for any reason', 'if'), ('by including the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'by')] ----> Also during the tracking area updating procedure with the " active " flag set the MME shall inform the UE of the deactivated EPS bearer context
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the DCN-ID IE, then the UE shall store the included DCN-ID value together with the PLMN code of the registered PLMN in a DCN-ID list in a non-volatile memory in the ME as specified in annex C.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the DCN-ID IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall store the included DCN-ID value together with the PLMN code of the registered PLMN in a DCN-ID list in a non-volatile memory in the ME as specified in annex C
>> When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode, the MME locally deactivates all non-emergency EPS bearer contexts and informs the UE via the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode', 'when')] ----> the MME locally deactivates all non-emergency EPS bearer contexts
>> When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode, the MME locally deactivates all non-emergency EPS bearer contexts and informs the UE via the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('When the tracking area updating procedure is initiated in EMM-IDLE mode', 'when')] ----> the MME locally informs the UE via the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message
>> If a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is received from a UE with a LIPA PDN connection, and if, a GW Transport Layer Address IE value identifying a L-GW is provided by the lower layer together with the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, and the P-GW address included in the EPS bearer context of the LIPA PDN Connection is different from the provided GW Transport Layer Address IE value;
[('a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message received from a UE with a LIPA PDN connection', 'if'), ('a GW Transport Layer Address IE value identifying a L-GW provided by the lower layer together with the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if')] ----> the P-GW address included in the EPS bearer context of the LIPA PDN Connection is different from the provided GW Transport Layer Address IE value
>> if no active EPS bearer contexts remain for the UE, the MME shall not accept the tracking area update request as specified in subclause 5.5.3.2.5;
[('if no active EPS bearer contexts remain for the UE', 'if')] ----> the MME shall not accept the tracking area update request as specified in subclause 5.5.3.2.5
>> if active EPS bearer contexts remain for the UE and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is accepted, the MME informs the UE via the EPS bearer context status IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message that EPS bearer contexts were locally deactivated.
[('if active EPS bearer contexts remain for the UE and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is accepted', 'if')] ----> the MME informs the UE via the EPS bearer context status IE message that EPS bearer contexts were locally deactivated
>> If a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is received from a UE with a SIPTO at the local network PDN connection, is accepted by the network, the following different cases can be distinguished:
[('If a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is received from a UE with a SIPTO at the local network PDN connection , is accepted by the network', 'if')] ----> the following different cases can distinguished
>> If the PDN connection is a SIPTO at the local network PDN connection with collocated L-GW and if, a SIPTO L-GW Transport Layer Address IE value identifying a L-GW is provided by the lower layer together with the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, and the P-GW address included in the EPS bearer context of the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection is different from the provided SIPTO L-GW Transport Layer Address IE value;
[('the PDN connection is a SIPTO at the local network PDN connection with collocated L-GW', 'if'), ('value identifying a L-GW', 'if'), ('a L-GW provided by the lower layer', 'if')] ----> the P-GW address included in the EPS bearer context of the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection is different from the provided SIPTO L-GW Transport Layer Address IE value
>> If the PDN connection is a SIPTO at the local network PDN connection with stand-alone GW and if, a LHN-ID value is provided by the lower layer together with the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, and the LHN-ID stored in the EPS bearer context of the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection is different from the provided LHN-ID value;
[('If the PDN connection is a SIPTO at the local network PDN connection with stand-alone GW and', 'if')] ----> the LHN-ID stored in the EPS bearer context of the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection is different from the provided LHN-ID value
>> if the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection is the last remaining PDN connection for the UE, and EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME, then the MME shall upon completion of the tracking area updating procedure initiate an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure with ESM cause #39 "reactivation requested"for the default EPS bearer context of the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection;
[('upon completion of the tracking area updating procedure', 'upon'), ('the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection is the last remaining PDN connection for the UE', 'if'), ('EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection supported by the UE and the MME', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall initiate an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure with ESM cause # 39 " reactivation requested"for the default EPS bearer context of the SIPTO at the local network PDN connection
>> if a PDN connection remains that is not SIPTO at the local network PDN connection, the MME shall upon completion of the tracking area updating procedure initiate an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure with ESM cause #39 "reactivation requested"for the default EPS bearer context of each SIPTO at the local network PDN connection;
[('upon completion of the tracking area updating procedure', 'upon'), ('a PDN connection remains', 'if'), ('that is not SIPTO at the local network PDN connection', 'if')] ----> the MME shall initiate an EPS bearer context deactivation procedure with ESM cause # 39 " reactivation requested"for the default EPS bearer context of each SIPTO at the local network PDN connection
>> If the "active" flag is set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the MME, the MME shall re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts.
[('If the " active " flag is set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME shall re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts
>> If the "active" flag is set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the MME, the MME shall re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts associated with PDN connections established without Control plane only indication.
[('If the " active " flag is set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME shall re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts associated with PDN connections established without Control plane only indication
>> If the "signalling active" flag is set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the MME, the MME shall not immediately release the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure.
[('If the " signalling active " flag is set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME shall not immediately release the NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure
>> If the "active" flag is not set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the MME, the MME may also re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts due to downlink pending data or downlink pending signalling.
[('If the " active " flag is not set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME may also re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts due to downlink pending data or downlink pending signalling
>> If the "active" flag is not set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the MME, the MME may also re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts associated with PDN connections established without Control plane only indication due to downlink pending data or downlink pending signalling.
[('If the " active " flag is not set in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and control plane CIoT EPS optimization is used by the MME', 'if')] ----> the MME may also re-establish the radio and S1 bearers for all active EPS bearer contexts associated with PDN connections established without Control plane only indication due to downlink pending data or downlink pending signalling
>> If the MME supports NB-S1 mode, Non-IP or Ethernet PDN type, inter-system change with 5GS, or the network wants to enforce the use of DNS over TLS, then the MME shall support the extended protocol configuration options IE.
[('the network wants to enforce the use of DNS over TLS', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall support the extended protocol configuration options IE
>> If the MME supports NB-S1 mode, Non-IP or Ethernet PDN type, inter-system change with 5GS, or the network wants to enforce the use of DNS over TLS, then the MME shall support the extended protocol configuration options IE.
[('the MME supports NB-S1 mode , Non-IP or Ethernet PDN type ,', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall support the extended protocol configuration options IE
>> If the MME supports the extended protocol configuration options IE and the UE indicated support of the extended protocol configuration options IE, then the MME shall set the ePCO bit to "extended protocol configuration options supported" in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('the MME supports the extended protocol configuration options IE', 'if'), ('the UE indicated support of the extended protocol configuration options IE', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall set the ePCO bit to " extended protocol configuration options supported " in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT
>> If the UE indicates support for restriction on use of enhanced coverage in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, and the network decides to restrict the use of enhanced coverage for the UE, then the MME shall set the RestrictEC bit to "Use of enhanced coverage is restricted" in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('the UE indicates support for restriction on use of enhanced coverage in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if'), ('the network decides to restrict the use of enhanced coverage for the UE', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall set the RestrictEC bit to " Use of enhanced coverage is restricted " in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT
>> If the UE has indicated support for the control plane data back-off timer, and the MME decides to activate the congestion control for transport of user data via the control plane, then the MME shall include the T3448 value IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('the UE indicated support for the control plane data back-off timer', 'if'), ('the MME decides to activate the congestion control for transport of user data via the control plane', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall include the T3448 value IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message
>> If the UE indicates support for dual connectivity with NR in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, and the MME decides to restrict the use of dual connectivity with NR for the UE, then the MME shall set the RestrictDCNR bit to "Use of dual connectivity with NR is restricted" in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('the UE indicates support for dual connectivity with NR in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if'), ('the MME decides to restrict the use of dual connectivity with NR for the UE', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall set the RestrictDCNR bit to " Use of dual connectivity with NR is restricted " in the EPS network feature
>> If the UE indicates support for N1 mode in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the MME supports inter-system interworking with 5GS, the MME may set the IWK N26 bit to either:
[('the UE indicates support for N1 mode in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if'), ('the MME supports inter-system interworking with 5GS', 'if')] ----> the MME may set the IWK N26 bit to either
>> If due to operator policies unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is not allowed in the current PLMN, the MME shall set the redir-policy bit to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed" in the Network policy IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('If due to operator policies unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is not allowed in the current PLMN', 'if')] ----> the MME shall set the redir-policy bit to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed "
>> If the network supports signalling for a maximum number of 15 EPS bearer contexts and the UE indicated support of signalling for a maximum number of 15 EPS bearer contexts in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, then the MME shall set the 15 bearers bit to "Signalling for a maximum number of 15 EPS bearer contexts supported" in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('the network supports signalling for a maximum number of 15 EPS bearer contexts', 'if'), ('the UE indicated support of signalling for a maximum number of 15 EPS bearer contexts', 'if')] ----> then the MME shall set the 15 bearers bit to " Signalling for a maximum number of 15 EPS bearer contexts supported " in the EPS network
>> Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop timer T3430, reset the service request attempt counter, tracking area updating attempt counter, enter state EMM-REGISTERED and set the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED.
[('Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'upon')] ----> the UE shall enter state EMM-REGISTERED
>> Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop timer T3430, reset the service request attempt counter, tracking area updating attempt counter, enter state EMM-REGISTERED and set the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED.
[('Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'upon')] ----> the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED
>> Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop timer T3430, reset the service request attempt counter, tracking area updating attempt counter, enter state EMM-REGISTERED and set the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED.
[('Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'upon')] ----> the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter , tracking area updating attempt counter
>> Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop timer T3430, reset the service request attempt counter, tracking area updating attempt counter, enter state EMM-REGISTERED and set the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED.
[('Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'upon')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3430
>> If the message contains a GUTI, the UE shall use this GUTI as new temporary identity for EPS services and shall store the new GUTI.
[('If the message contains a GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall use this GUTI as new temporary identity for EPS services
>> If the message contains a GUTI, the UE shall use this GUTI as new temporary identity for EPS services and shall store the new GUTI.
[('If the message contains a GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall store the new GUTI
>> If no GUTI was included by the MME in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the old GUTI shall be used.
[('If no GUTI was included by the MME in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the old GUTI shall used
>> If the UE receives a new TAI list in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall consider the new TAI list as valid and the old TAI list as invalid; otherwise, the UE shall consider the old TAI list as valid.
[('If the UE receives a new TAI list in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall consider the new TAI list as valid the
>> If the UE receives the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message from a PLMN for which a PLMN-specific attempt counter or PLMN-specific PS-attempt counter is maintained, then the UE shall reset these counters.
[('the UE receives the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT', 'if'), ('message a PLMN for which a PLMN-specific attempt counter or PLMN-specific PS-attempt counter maintained', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall reset these counters
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3412 extended value IE, then the UE shall use the T3412 extended value IE as periodic tracking area update timer.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3412 extended value IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall use the T3412 extended value IE as periodic tracking area update timer
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT contains T3412 value IE, but not T3412 extended value IE, then the UE shall use value in T3412 value IE as periodic tracking area update timer.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT contains T3412 value IE , but not T3412 extended value IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall use value in T3412 value IE as periodic tracking area update timer
>> If neither T3412 value IE nor T3412 extended value IE is included, the UE shall use the value currently stored, e.g. from a prior ATTACH ACCEPT or TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('If neither T3412 value IE nor T3412 extended value IE is included', 'if')] ----> the UE shall use the value currently stored , e.g . from a prior ATTACH ACCEPT or TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3324 value IE, then the UE shall use the timer value for T3324 as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13], subclause 4.7.2.8.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3324 value IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall use the timer value for T3324 as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] , subclause 4.7.2.8
>> If the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure in EMM-IDLE mode to perform an inter-system change from A/Gb mode or Iu mode to S1 mode and the nonceUE was included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, the UE shall delete the nonceUE upon receipt of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('upon receiving of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT', 'upon'), ('If the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure in EMM-IDLE mode to perform an inter-system change from A/Gb mode or Iu mode to S1 mode and the nonceUE was included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall delete the nonceUE
>> If an EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall deactivate all those EPS bearers contexts locally which are active in the UE, but are indicated by the MME as being inactive.
[('If an EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall deactivate all those EPS bearers contexts locally which are active in the UE , but are indicated by the MME as being inactive
>> If a default EPS bearer context is marked as inactive in the EPS bearer context status IE included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, and this default bearer is not associated with the last remaining PDN connection in the UE, the UE shall locally deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the MME.
[('a default EPS bearer context marked as inactive in the EPS bearer context status IE included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if'), ('this default bearer not associated with the last remaining PDN connection in the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall locally deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the MME
>> If only the PDN connection for emergency bearer services remains established, the UE shall consider itself attached for emergency bearer services only.
[('If only the PDN connection for emergency bearer services remains established', 'if')] ----> the UE shall consider itself attached for emergency bearer services only
>> If the default bearer is associated with the last remaining PDN connection of the UE in the MME, and EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME, the UE shall locally deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the UE.
[('If the default bearer is associated with the last remaining PDN connection of the UE in the MME , and EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection is supported by the UE and the MME', 'if')] ----> the UE shall deactivate all EPS bearer contexts associated to the PDN connection with the default EPS bearer context without peer-to-peer ESM signalling to the UE
>> If an EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE may choose to ignore all those EPS bearers which are indicated by the MME as being active but are inactive at the UE.
[('If an EPS bearer context status IE is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE may choose to ignore all those EPS bearers which are indicated by the MME as being active but are inactive at the UE
>> The UE shall store the list as provided by the network, and if there is no PDN connection for emergency bearer services or PDN connection for RLOS established, the UE shall remove from the list any PLMN code that is already in the list of "forbidden PLMNs" or in the list of "forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service".
[('if there is no PDN connection for emergency bearer services or PDN connection for RLOS established', 'if')] ----> the UE shall remove from the list any PLMN code that is already in the list of " forbidden PLMNs " or in the list of " forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service "
>> If the UE is not attached for emergency bearer services and there is a PDN connection for emergency bearer services established, the UE shall remove from the list of equivalent PLMNs any PLMN code present in the list of forbidden PLMNs or in the list of "forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service" when the PDN connection for emergency bearer services is released.
[('when the PDN connection for emergency bearer services is released', 'when'), ('the UE not attached for emergency bearer services', 'if'), ('is a PDN connection for emergency bearer services established', 'if')] ----> the UE shall remove from the list of equivalent PLMNs any PLMN code present in the list of forbidden PLMNs or in the list of " forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service "
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not contain a list, then the UE shall delete the stored list.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not contain a list', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall delete the stored list
>> If the UE is neither attached for emergency bearer services nor attached for access to RLOS, and if the PLMN identity of the registered PLMN is a member of the list of "forbidden PLMNs" or the list of "forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service", any such PLMN identity shall be deleted from the corresponding list.
[('the UE neither attached for emergency bearer services', 'if'), ('the UE attached for access to RLOS', 'if'), ('the PLMN identity of the registered PLMN is a member of the list of " forbidden PLMNs " or the list of " forbidden PLMNs for GPRS service', 'if')] ----> any such PLMN identity shall deleted from the corresponding list
>> If the UE is attached for emergency bearer services, the network shall indicate in the EPS update result IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message that ISR is not activated.
[('If the UE is attached for emergency bearer services', 'if')] ----> the network shall indicate in the EPS update result IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message that ISR is not activated
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, no indication that ISR is activated, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains , no indication that ISR is activated', 'if'), ('if running', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, no indication that ISR is activated, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains , no indication that ISR is activated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the TIN to " GUTI "
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, if the UE is required to perform routing area updating for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13], annex P.5, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[('if the UE is required to perform routing area updating for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] , annex P.5', 'if'), ('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the TIN to " GUTI "
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, if the UE is required to perform routing area updating for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13], annex P.5, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[('if the UE is required to perform routing area updating for IMS voice termination as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] , annex P.5', 'if'), ('if running', 'if'), ('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in UE network capability or change in DRX parameters, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[('if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in UE network capability or change in DRX parameters', 'if'), ('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the TIN to " GUTI "
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in UE network capability or change in DRX parameters, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[('if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in UE network capability or change in DRX parameters', 'if'), ('if running', 'if'), ('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in the UE's usage setting or the voice domain preference for E-UTRAN, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[("if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in the UE's usage setting or the voice domain preference for E-UTRAN", 'if'), ('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall set the TIN to " GUTI "
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in the UE's usage setting or the voice domain preference for E-UTRAN, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI" and shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323, if running;
[("if the UE had initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to a change in the UE's usage setting or the voice domain preference for E-UTRAN", 'if'), ('if running', 'if'), ('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall stop the periodic routing area update timer T3312 or T3323
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains, an indication that ISR is activated, then, the UE shall regard a previously assigned P-TMSI and RAI as valid and registered with the network.
[('message contains', 'if'), ('ISR activated', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall regard a previously assigned P-TMSI and RAI as valid and registered with the network
>> If the TIN currently indicates "P-TMSI" and the periodic routing area update timer T3312 is running or is deactivated, the UE shall set the TIN to "RAT-related TMSI".
[('If the TIN currently indicates " P-TMSI " and the periodic routing area update timer T3312 running', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the TIN to " RAT-related TMSI "
>> If the TIN currently indicates "P-TMSI" and the periodic routing area update timer T3312 is running or is deactivated, the UE shall set the TIN to "RAT-related TMSI".
[('the periodic routing area update timer T3312 deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the TIN to " RAT-related TMSI "
>> If the TIN currently indicates "P-TMSI" and the periodic routing area update timer T3312 has already expired, the UE shall set the TIN to "GUTI".
[('If the TIN currently indicates " P-TMSI " and the periodic routing area update timer T3312 has already expired', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the TIN to " GUTI "
>> When the UE determines via the IMS voice over PS session indicator that the network does not support IMS voice over PS sessions in S1 mode, then the UE shall not locally release any persistent EPS bearer context.
[('When the UE determines via the IMS voice over PS session indicator that the network does not support IMS voice over PS sessions in S1 mode', 'when')] ----> then the UE shall not locally release any persistent EPS bearer context
>> When the UE determines via the emergency bearer services indicator that the network does not support emergency bearer services in S1 mode, then the UE shall not locally release any emergency EPS bearer context if there is a radio bearer associated with that context.
[('When the UE determines via the emergency bearer services indicator that the network does not support emergency bearer services in S1 mode', 'when'), ('if there is a radio bearer associated with that context', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall not locally release any emergency EPS bearer context
>> If the RestrictDCNR bit is set to "Use of dual connectivity with NR is restricted" in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall provide the indication that dual connectivity with NR is restricted to the upper layers.
[('If the RestrictDCNR bit is set to " Use of dual connectivity with NR is restricted " in the EPS network feature support IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall provide the indication that dual connectivity with NR is restricted to the upper layers
>> If the redir-policy bit is set to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed" in the Network policy IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed" and indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is not allowed.
[('If the redir-policy bit is set to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed " in the Network policy IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed "
>> If the redir-policy bit is set to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed" in the Network policy IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed" and indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is not allowed.
[('If the redir-policy bit is set to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN not allowed " in the Network policy IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is not allowed
>> If the redir-policy bit is set to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" or if the Network policy IE is not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" and indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is allowed.
[('the Network policy IE not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed
>> If the redir-policy bit is set to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" or if the Network policy IE is not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" and indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is allowed.
[('the redir-policy bit set to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed', 'if')] ----> the UE shall indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is allowed
>> If the redir-policy bit is set to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" or if the Network policy IE is not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" and indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is allowed.
[('the redir-policy bit set to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to " Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed
>> If the redir-policy bit is set to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" or if the Network policy IE is not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall set the network policy on unsecured redirection to GERAN for the current PLMN to "Unsecured redirection to GERAN allowed" and indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is allowed.
[('the Network policy IE not included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT', 'if')] ----> the UE shall indicate to the lower layers that unsecured redirection to a GERAN cell is allowed
>> If the UE has initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to manual CSG selection and receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, and the UE sent the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message in a CSG cell, the UE shall check if the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell where the UE has sent the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message are contained in the Allowed CSG list.
[('the UE initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to manual CSG selection', 'if'), ('the UE receives a TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if'), ('the UE sent the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message in a CSG cell', 'if')] ----> the UE shall check if the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell where the UE has sent the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message are contained in the Allowed CSG list
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contained a GUTI, the UE shall return a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message to the MME to acknowledge the received GUTI.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contained a GUTI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall return a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message to the MME to acknowledge the received GUTI
>> If the UE which was previously successfully attached for EPS and non-EPS services receives the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message with EPS update result IE indicating "combined TA/LA updated" or "combined TA/LA updated and ISR activated" as the response of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with EPS update type IE indicating "periodic updating", the UE shall behave as follows:
[('the UE which was previously successfully attached for EPS and non - EPS services receives the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT', 'if'), ('result IE indicating " combined TA/LA updated " or " combined TA/LA updated and ISR activated "', 'if'), ('EPS update type IE indicating " periodic updating "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall behave as follows
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains an IMSI, the UE is not allocated any TMSI, and shall delete any old TMSI accordingly.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains an IMSI', 'if')] ----> the UE not allocated any TMSI
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains an IMSI, the UE is not allocated any TMSI, and shall delete any old TMSI accordingly.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains an IMSI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall delete any old TMSI accordingly
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains a TMSI, the UE shall use this TMSI as new temporary identity.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains a TMSI', 'if')] ----> the UE shall use this TMSI as new temporary identity
>> If neither a TMSI nor an IMSI has been included by the network in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the old TMSI, if any is available, shall be kept.
[('If neither a TMSI nor an IMSI has been included by the network in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if'), ('if any is available', 'if')] ----> the old TMSI shall kept
>> If the header compression configuration status is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop using header compression and decompression for those EPS bearers using Control plane CIoT EPS optimisation for which the MME indicated that the header compression configuration is not used.
[('If the header compression configuration status is included in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop using header compression and decompression for those EPS bearers using Control plane CIoT EPS optimisation for which the MME indicated that the header compression configuration is not used
>> If the T3448 value IE is present in the received TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop timer T3448 if it is running, and start timer T3448 with the value provided in the T3448 value IE.
[('If the T3448 value IE is present in the received TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if'), ('if it is running', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3448
>> If the T3448 value IE is present in the received TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message, the UE shall stop timer T3448 if it is running, and start timer T3448 with the value provided in the T3448 value IE.
[('If the T3448 value IE is present in the received TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3448 with the value provided in the T3448 value IE
>> If the UE in EMM-IDLE mode initiated the tracking area updating procedure and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not include the T3448 value IE and if timer T3448 is running, then the UE shall stop timer T3448.
[('if timer T3448 is running', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall stop timer T3448
>> If the UE has indicated "service gap control supported" in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and, the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3447 value IE, then the UE shall store the new T3447 value, erase any previous stored T3447 value if exists and use the the new T3447 value with the T3447 timer next time it is started;
[('If the UE has indicated " service gap control supported " in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and , the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3447 value IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall store the new T3447 value
>> If the UE has indicated "service gap control supported" in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and, the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3447 value IE, then the UE shall store the new T3447 value, erase any previous stored T3447 value if exists and use the the new T3447 value with the T3447 timer next time it is started;
[('If the UE has indicated " service gap control supported " in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and , the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3447 value IE', 'if'), ('if exists', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall erase any previous stored T3447 value
>> If the UE has indicated "service gap control supported" in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and, the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3447 value IE, then the UE shall store the new T3447 value, erase any previous stored T3447 value if exists and use the the new T3447 value with the T3447 timer next time it is started;
[('If the UE has indicated " service gap control supported " in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and , the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contains the T3447 value IE', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall use the the new T3447 value with the T3447 timer next time it is started
>> If the UE has indicated "service gap control supported" in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and, the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not contain the T3447 value IE, then the UE shall erase any previous stored T3447 value if exists and stop the T3447 timer if running.
[('If the UE has indicated " service gap control supported " in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and , the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not contain the T3447 value IE', 'if'), ('if exists', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall erase any previous stored T3447 value
>> If the UE has indicated "service gap control supported" in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and, the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not contain the T3447 value IE, then the UE shall erase any previous stored T3447 value if exists and stop the T3447 timer if running.
[('If the UE has indicated " service gap control supported " in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and , the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message does not contain the T3447 value IE', 'if'), ('if running', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall stop the T3447 timer
>> Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message, the MME shall stop timer T3450 and change to state EMM-REGISTERED.
[('Upon receiving a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message', 'upon')] ----> the MME shall stop timer T3450
>> For inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode or Iu mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode, if the UE has included an eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE indicating a current EPS security context in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message by which the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is integrity protected, the MME shall take one of the following actions:
[('if the UE has included an eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE indicating a current EPS security context in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message by which the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> For inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode or Iu mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode the MME shall take one of the following actions
>> if the MME retrieves the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE, the MME shall integrity check the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message using the current EPS security context and integrity protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message using the current EPS security context;
[('if the MME retrieves the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE', 'if')] ----> the MME shall check the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message using the current EPS security context
>> if the MME retrieves the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE, the MME shall integrity check the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message using the current EPS security context and integrity protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message using the current EPS security context;
[('if the MME retrieves the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE', 'if')] ----> the MME shall protect the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT using the current EPS security context
>> if the MME cannot retrieve the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE, and if the UE has included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number, the MME shall create a new mapped EPS security context as specified in 3GPP TS 33.401 [19], and then perform a security mode control procedure to indicate the use of the new mapped EPS security context to the UE;
[('the MME cannot retrieve the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE', 'if'), ('the UE included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number', 'if')] ----> the MME shall create a new mapped EPS security context as specified in 3GPP TS 33.401 [ 19 ]
>> if the MME cannot retrieve the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE, and if the UE has included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number, the MME shall create a new mapped EPS security context as specified in 3GPP TS 33.401 [19], and then perform a security mode control procedure to indicate the use of the new mapped EPS security context to the UE;
[('the MME cannot retrieve the current EPS security context as indicated by the eKSI and GUTI sent by the UE', 'if'), ('the UE included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number', 'if')] ----> the MME shall then perform a security mode control procedure to indicate the use of the new mapped EPS security context to the UE
>> if the UE has not included an Additional GUTI IE, the MME may treat the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message as in the previous item, i.e. as if it cannot retrieve the current EPS security context.
[('if the UE has not included an Additional GUTI IE', 'if')] ----> the MME may treat the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message as in the previous item , i.e . as if it cannot retrieve the current EPS security context
>> For inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode or Iu mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode, if the UE has not included a valid eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE and has included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, the MME shall create a new mapped EPS security context as specified in 3GPP TS 33.401 [19], and then perform a security mode control procedure to indicate the use of the new mapped EPS security context to the UE.
[('the UE not included a valid eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE', 'if'), ('the UE included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST', 'if')] ----> For inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode or Iu mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode the MME shall create a new mapped EPS security context as specified in 3GPP TS 33.401 [ 19 ]
>> For inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode or Iu mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode, if the UE has not included a valid eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE and has included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, the MME shall create a new mapped EPS security context as specified in 3GPP TS 33.401 [19], and then perform a security mode control procedure to indicate the use of the new mapped EPS security context to the UE.
[('the UE not included a valid eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE', 'if'), ('the UE included a valid GPRS ciphering key sequence number in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST', 'if')] ----> For inter-system change from A/Gb mode to S1 mode or Iu mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode the MME shall then perform a security mode control procedure to indicate the use of the new mapped EPS security context to the UE
>> For inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode, if the UE has included an eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE indicating a 5G NAS security context in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message by which the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is integrity protected, the MME shall take actions as specified in subclause 4.4.2.3.
[('if the UE has included an eKSI in the NAS Key Set Identifier IE indicating a 5G NAS security context in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message by which the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> For inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode in EMM-IDLE mode the MME shall take actions as specified in subclause 4.4.2.3
>> if the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST does not contain a valid KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE, the MME shall remove the non-current native EPS security context, if any, for any GUTI for this UE.
[('if the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST does not contain a valid KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE', 'if')] ----> the MME shall remove the non-current native EPS security context , if any , for any GUTI for this UE
>> if the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST contains a valid KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE, the MME may initiate a security mode control procedure to take the corresponding native EPS security context into use.
[('if the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST contains a valid KSIASME in the Non-current native NAS key set identifier IE', 'if')] ----> the MME may initiate a security mode control procedure to take the corresponding native EPS security context into use
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the UE has set the RACS bit to "RACS supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, the MME may include a UE radio capability ID IE or a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message.
[('if the UE has set the RACS bit to " RACS supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the MME may include a UE radio capability ID IE or a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the UE has set the RACS bit to "RACS supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes, a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE set to "Network-assigned UE radio capability IDs deletion requested", the UE shall, delete any network-assigned UE radio capability IDs associated with the registered PLMN stored at the UE;
[('if the UE has set the RACS bit to " RACS supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes , a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE set to " Network-assigned UE radio capability IDs deletion requested "', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the UE shall delete any network-assigned UE radio capability IDs associated with the registered PLMN stored at the UE
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the UE has set the RACS bit to "RACS supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes, a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE set to "Network-assigned UE radio capability IDs deletion requested", the UE shall, send a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message to the network to acknowledge the received UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE;
[('if the UE has set the RACS bit to " RACS supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes , a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE set to " Network-assigned UE radio capability IDs deletion requested "', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the UE shall send a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message to the network to acknowledge the received UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the UE has set the RACS bit to "RACS supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes, a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE set to "Network-assigned UE radio capability IDs deletion requested", the UE shall, after the completion of the ongoing tracking area updating procedure, initiate a tracking area updating procedure as specified in subclause 5.5.3 over the existing NAS signalling connection;
[('if the UE has set the RACS bit to " RACS supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes , a UE radio capability ID deletion indication IE set to " Network-assigned UE radio capability IDs deletion requested "', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the UE shall after the completion of the ongoing tracking area updating procedure initiate a tracking area updating procedure as specified in subclause 5.5.3 over the existing NAS signalling connection
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the UE has set the RACS bit to "RACS supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes, a UE radio capability ID IE, the UE shall, store the UE radio capability ID as specified in annex C;
[('if the UE has set the RACS bit to " RACS supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes , a UE radio capability ID IE', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the UE shall store the UE radio capability ID as specified in annex C
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the UE has set the RACS bit to "RACS supported" in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes, a UE radio capability ID IE, the UE shall, send a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message to the network to acknowledge the received UE radio capability ID IE.
[('if the UE has set the RACS bit to " RACS supported " in the UE network capability IE of the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message includes , a UE radio capability ID IE', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the UE shall send a TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message to the network to acknowledge the received UE radio capability ID IE
>> In NB-S1 mode, if the UE requested "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE and supports NB-S1 mode only, the MME decides to accept the tracking area update request for EPS services only and, the location update for non-EPS services is not accepted by the VLR as specified in 3GPP TS 29.118 [16A];
[('the UE requested "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE', 'if'), ('the UE supports NB-S1 mode only', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the MME decides to accept the tracking area update request for EPS services only
>> In NB-S1 mode, if the UE requested "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE and supports NB-S1 mode only, the MME decides to accept the tracking area update request for EPS services only and, the MME decides to not accept the tracking area update request for "SMS only",
[('the UE requested "SMS only" in the Additional update type IE', 'if'), ('the UE supports NB-S1 mode only', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the MME decides to accept the tracking area update request for EPS services only
>> The UE shall stop timer T3430 if still running, shall reset the tracking area updating attempt counter, shall set the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED and shall enter state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop timer T3430
>> The UE shall stop timer T3430 if still running.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop timer T3430
>> The UE shall stop the timer T3430 if still running.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop the timer T3430
>> If the tracking area updating cannot be accepted by the network, the MME sends a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message to the UE including an appropriate EMM cause value.
[('If the tracking area updating cannot be accepted by the network', 'if')] ----> the MME sends a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message to the UE including an appropriate EMM cause value
>> If a tracking area update request from a UE with a LIPA PDN connection is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.5.3.2.4, the MME shall send the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause value #10 "Implicitly detached".
[('If a tracking area update request from a UE with a LIPA PDN connection is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.5.3.2.4', 'if')] ----> the MME shall send the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause value # 10 " Implicitly detached "
>> If the tracking area update request is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('If the tracking area update request is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control', 'if')] ----> the network shall assign a value for back-off timer T3346
>> If the tracking area update request is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('If the tracking area update request is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control', 'if')] ----> the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 22 " congestion "
>> In NB-S1 mode, if the tracking area update request is rejected due to operator determined barring, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('if the tracking area update request is rejected due to operator determined barring', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the network shall assign a value for back-off timer T3346
>> In NB-S1 mode, if the tracking area update request is rejected due to operator determined barring, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('if the tracking area update request is rejected due to operator determined barring', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 22 " congestion "
>> If the tracking area request is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e. the T3447 timer is running, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and may assign a back-off timer T3346 with the remaining time of the running T3447 timer.
[('If the tracking area request is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e . the T3447 timer is running', 'if')] ----> the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 22 " congestion "
>> If the tracking area request is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e. the T3447 timer is running, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and may assign a back-off timer T3346 with the remaining time of the running T3447 timer.
[('If the tracking area request is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e . the T3447 timer is running', 'if')] ----> the network may assign a back-off timer T3346 with the remaining time of the running T3447 timer
>> If the tracking area update request is rejected due to incompatibility between the CIoT EPS optimizations supported by the UE and what the network supports and the network sets the EMM cause value to #15 "no suitable cells in tracking area", the network may additionally include the Extended EMM cause IE with value "requested EPS optimization not supported".
[('If the tracking area update request is rejected due to incompatibility between the CIoT EPS optimizations supported by the UE and what the network supports and the network sets the EMM cause value to # 15 " no suitable cells in tracking area "', 'if')] ----> the network may additionally include the Extended EMM cause IE with value " requested EPS optimization not supported "
>> Based on operator policy, if the tracking area update request is rejected due to core network redirection for CIoT optimizations, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #31 "Redirection to 5GCN required".
[('if the tracking area update request is rejected due to core network redirection for CIoT optimizations', 'if')] ----> Based on operator policy the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 31 " Redirection to 5GCN required
>> If the UE initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode, and the MME does not support N26 interface, the MME shall send a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause value #9 "UE identity cannot be derived by the network".
[('the UE initiated the tracking area updating procedure due to inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode', 'if'), ('the MME not support N26 interface', 'if')] ----> the MME shall send a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause value # 9 " UE identity cannot be derived by the network "
>> Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message, if the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall stop timer T3430 and stop any transmission of user data.
[('Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message', 'upon'), ('the message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop any transmission of user data
>> Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message, if the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall stop timer T3430 and stop any transmission of user data.
[('Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message', 'upon'), ('the message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3430
>> Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message, if the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall stop timer T3430 and stop any transmission of user data.
[('Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message', 'upon'), ('the message contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value # 25', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3430
>> Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message, if the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall stop timer T3430 and stop any transmission of user data.
[('Upon receiving the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message', 'upon'), ('the message contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value # 25', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop any transmission of user data
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause #25 was received without integrity protection, then the UE shall discard the message.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause # 25 was received without integrity protection', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall discard the message
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, GPRS update status, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number and the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI and ciphering key sequence number as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the normal routing area updating procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state , GPRS update status , P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number and the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI and ciphering key sequence number as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the normal routing area updating procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value

[('if present', 'if')] ----> the UE shall remove the current TAI from the stored TAI list
>> If the T3346 value IE is present in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall proceed as described below, otherwise it shall be considered as an abnormal case and the behaviour of the UE for this case is specified in subclause 5.5.3.2.6.

>> In WB-S1 mode, if the tracking area updating procedure is started in response to a paging request from the network, access class barring, EAB or ACDC is not applicable.
