[('if , the upper layers request user plane radio resources', 'if')] ----> ACDC is applicable to the request
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if access is barred because of access class barring for "originating signalling" and if, one of the MO MMTEL voice call is started, MO MMTEL video call is started or MO SMSoIP is started conditions is satisfied;
[('access barred because of access class barring for " originating signalling "', 'if')] ----> conditions is satisfied
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if access is barred because of access class barring for "originating signalling" and if, one of the MO MMTEL voice call is started, MO MMTEL video call is started or MO SMSoIP is started conditions is satisfied;
[('MO SMSoIP is started', 'if')] ----> conditions is satisfied
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if access is barred because of access class barring for "originating signalling" and if, the upper layers request to send a mobile originated SMS over NAS or SMS over S102;
[('access barred because of access class barring for " originating signalling "', 'if'), ('the upper layers request to send a mobile originated SMS over NAS or SMS over S102', 'if')] ----> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if access is barred because of access class barring for "originating signalling" and if, the upper layers request user plane radio resources, ACDC is applicable to the request and the UE supports ACDC.
[('if access is barred because of access class barring for " originating signalling "', 'if'), ('if , the upper layers request user plane radio resources', 'if')] ----> ACDC is applicable to the request
>> If access is barred for a certain ACDC category, and if the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a higher ACDC category and the UE supports ACDC, then the tracking area updating procedure shall be started according to subclause 5.5.3.2.2.
[('access barred for a certain ACDC category', 'if'), ('the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a higher ACDC category', 'if'), ('the UE supports ACDC', 'if')] ----> then the tracking area updating procedure shall started according to subclause 5.5.3.2.2
>> If an access request for an uncategorized application is barred due to ACDC, and if the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a certain ACDC category and the UE supports ACDC, then the tracking area updating procedure shall be started according to subclause 5.5.3.2.2.
[('an access request for an uncategorized application barred due to ACDC', 'if'), ('the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a certain ACDC category', 'if'), ('the UE supports ACDC', 'if')] ----> then the tracking area updating procedure shall started according to subclause 5.5.3.2.2
>> If the trigger for the tracking area updating procedure is the response to a paging request from the network and the NAS signalling connection establishment is rejected by the network, the tracking area updating procedure shall not be started.
[('the trigger for the tracking area updating procedure is the response to a paging request from the network', 'if'), ('the NAS signalling connection establishment rejected by the network', 'if')] ----> the tracking area updating procedure shall not started
>> The tracking area updating procedure may be started if it is still necessary when access for "terminating calls" is granted or because of a cell change.
[('if it is still necessary when access for " terminating calls " is granted or because of a cell change', 'if')] ----> The tracking area updating procedure may started
>> If the tracking area updating request is not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services, upon reception of the EMM causes #95, #96, #97, #99 and #111 the UE should set the tracking area updating attempt counter to 5.
[('upon receiving of the EMM causes #95 , #96 , #97 , #99 and #111', 'upon'), ('If the tracking area updating request is not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services', 'if')] ----> the UE should set the tracking area updating attempt counter to 5
>> If a cell change into a new tracking area occurs before the tracking area updating procedure is completed, the tracking area updating procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated immediately.
[('If a cell change into a new tracking area occurs before the tracking area updating procedure is completed', 'if')] ----> the tracking area updating procedure shall aborted
>> If a cell change into a new tracking area occurs before the tracking area updating procedure is completed, the tracking area updating procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated immediately.
[('If a cell change into a new tracking area occurs before the tracking area updating procedure is completed', 'if')] ----> the tracking area updating procedure shall re-initiated immediately
>> If the DETACH REQUEST message contains detach type "re-attach not required" and EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the UE will follow the procedure as described below for the detach type "IMSI detach".
[('If the DETACH REQUEST message contains detach type " re-attach not required " and EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the UE will follow the procedure as described below for the detach type " IMSI detach "
>> If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the tracking area updating procedure has been completed, the DETACH REQUEST message shall be ignored and tracking area updating procedure shall be progressed.
[('If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message before the tracking area updating procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> the DETACH REQUEST message shall ignored
>> If the UE receives a GUTI REALLOCATION COMMAND message before the tracking area updating procedure has been completed, this message shall be ignored and the tracking area updating procedure shall be progressed.
[('If the UE receives a GUTI REALLOCATION COMMAND message before the tracking area updating procedure has been completed', 'if')] ----> this message shall ignored
>> If the current TAI is not in the TAI list, the tracking area updating procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated immediately.
[('If the current TAI is not in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the tracking area updating procedure shall re-initiated immediately
>> If the current TAI is not in the TAI list, the tracking area updating procedure shall be aborted and re-initiated immediately.
[('If the current TAI is not in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the tracking area updating procedure shall aborted
>> If the current TAI is still part of the TAI list, it is up to the UE implementation how to re-run the ongoing procedure.
[('If the current TAI is still part of the TAI list', 'if')] ----> is up to the UE implementation how to re-run the ongoing procedure
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message contained the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority", the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value and reset the tracking area updating attempt counter.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message contained the low priority indicator set to " MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time " value
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message contained the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority", the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value and reset the tracking area updating attempt counter.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message contained the low priority indicator set to " MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall reset the tracking area updating attempt counter
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message did not contain the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority", the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN, then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value and reset the tracking area updating attempt counter.
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message did not contain the low priority indicator set to " MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority "', 'if')] ----> mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time " value
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message did not contain the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority", the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN, then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value and reset the tracking area updating attempt counter.
[('the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message not contain the low priority indicator set to " MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority "', 'if'), ('the UE operating in NB-S1 mode', 'if'), ('the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall reset the tracking area updating attempt counter
>> If the UE had used eDRX before initiating tracking area updating procedure, then the UE shall continue to use the eDRX with the extended DRX parameters IE received during the last attach or tracking area updating procedure.
[('If the UE had used eDRX before initiating tracking area updating procedure', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall continue to use the eDRX with the extended DRX parameters IE received during the last attach or tracking area updating procedure
>> If the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and supports the timer T3448, the UE shall start the timer T3448 with the "Extended wait time CP data" value.
[('the UE operating in NB-S1 mode', 'if'), ('the UE supports the timer T3448', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start the timer T3448 with the " Extended wait time CP data " value
>> If the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and does not support the timer T3448, the UE shall start the timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time CP data" value and reset the tracking area updating attempt counter.
[('the UE operating in NB-S1 mode', 'if'), ('the UE not support the timer T3448', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start the timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time CP data " value
>> If the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and does not support the timer T3448, the UE shall start the timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time CP data" value and reset the tracking area updating attempt counter.
[('the UE operating in NB-S1 mode', 'if'), ('the UE not support the timer T3448', 'if')] ----> the UE shall reset the tracking area updating attempt counter
>> If the TAI of the current serving cell is not included in the TAI list or the TIN indicates "P-TMSI", the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and change to state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE.
[('If the TAI of the current serving cell is not included in the TAI list or the TIN indicates " P-TMSI "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED
>> If the TAI of the current serving cell is not included in the TAI list or the TIN indicates "P-TMSI", the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and change to state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE.
[('If the TAI of the current serving cell is not included in the TAI list or the TIN indicates " P-TMSI "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall change to state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE
>> If the tracking area updating procedure needs to be initiated for an MO MMTEL voice call is started, then a notification that the procedure was not initiated due to network congestion shall be provided to upper layers.
[('If the tracking area updating procedure needs to be initiated for an MO MMTEL voice call is started', 'if')] ----> then a notification that the procedure was not initiated due to network congestion shall provided to upper layers
>> The tracking area update request procedure is started, if still necessary, when timer T3447 expires.

>> Timer T3430 shall be stopped if still running.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> Timer T3430 shall stopped
>> For the cases b, c, d, la k when the "Extended wait time" is ignored, and ka when the "Extended wait time CP data" is ignored, if the tracking area updating request is not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services, the tracking area updating attempt counter shall be incremented, unless it was already set to 5.

>> If the tracking area updating attempt counter is less than 5, the TAI of the current serving cell is included in the TAI list, the EPS update status is equal to EU1 UPDATED, the TIN does not indicate "P-TMSI" and the tracking area updating procedure is performed not due to an inter-system change from N1 mode to S1 mode and the tracking area updating procedure is not performed due to cases g, m, n, za, zc in subclause 5.5.3.2.2, the UE shall keep the EPS update status to EU1 UPDATED and enter state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE.

>> If the tracking area updating attempt counter is equal to 5, the UE shall delete the list of equivalent PLMNs and shall change to state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE or optionally to EMM-REGISTERED.PLMN-SEARCH in order to perform a PLMN selection according to 3GPP TS 23.122 [6];

>> if the tracking area update was successful for EPS services only and the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contained a value included in the SMS services status IE not treated in subclause 5.5.3.2.4A or the SMS services status IE is not included in the message, the UE shall proceed as follows:
[('the tracking area update was successful for EPS services only', 'if'), ('the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message contained a value included in the SMS services status IE not treated in subclause 5.5.3.2.4A or the SMS services status IE is not included in the message', 'if')] ----> the UE shall proceed as follows
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before the message TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE has been received from the UE and a GUTI has been assigned, the network shall abort the procedure, enter EMM-IDLE mode and shall consider both, the old and new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before the message TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE has been received from the UE and a GUTI has been assigned', 'if')] ----> the network shall abort the procedure
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before the message TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE has been received from the UE and a GUTI has been assigned, the network shall abort the procedure, enter EMM-IDLE mode and shall consider both, the old and new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before the message TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE has been received from the UE and a GUTI has been assigned', 'if')] ----> the network shall enter EMM-IDLE mode
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before the message TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE has been received from the UE and a GUTI has been assigned, the network shall abort the procedure, enter EMM-IDLE mode and shall consider both, the old and new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before the message TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE has been received from the UE and a GUTI has been assigned', 'if')] ----> the network shall consider both , the old and new GUTI as valid until the old GUTI can be considered as invalid by the network
>> During this period the network may use the identification procedure followed by a GUTI reallocation procedure if the old GUTI is used by the UE in a subsequent message.
[('if the old GUTI is used by the UE in a subsequent message', 'if')] ----> During this period the network may use the identification procedure followed by a GUTI reallocation procedure
>> The network may page with IMSI if paging with old and new S-TMSI fails.
[('if paging with old and new S-TMSI fails', 'if')] ----> The network may page with IMSI
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message has been received with a protocol error, the network shall return a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with one of the following EMM cause values:
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message has been received with a protocol error', 'if')] ----> the network shall return a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with one of the following EMM cause values
>> If one or more of the information elements in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message differ from the ones received within the previous TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message, the previously initiated tracking area updating procedure shall be aborted if the TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message has not been received and the new tracking area updating procedure shall be progressed;
[('If one or more of the information elements in the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message differ from the ones received within the previous TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message', 'if'), ('if the TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message has not been received and the new tracking area updating procedure shall be progressed', 'if')] ----> the previously initiated tracking area updating procedure shall aborted
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message shall be resent and the timer T3450 shall be restarted if an TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message is expected.
[('if an TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE message is expected', 'if')] ----> the timer T3450 shall restarted
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the network shall continue with the previous tracking area updating procedure and shall not treat any further this TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the information elements do not differ', 'if')] ----> then the network shall not treat any further this TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the network shall continue with the previous tracking area updating procedure and shall not treat any further this TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message.
[('If the information elements do not differ', 'if')] ----> then the network shall continue with the previous tracking area updating procedure
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message or TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message could not be delivered due to an intra MME handover and the TAI of the target cell and the TAI of the source cell are the same, then upon successful completion of the intra MME handover the MME shall retransmit the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message or TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message.
[('upon successful completion of the intra MME handover', 'upon')] ----> then the MME shall retransmit the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT
>> If a failure of the handover procedure is reported by the lower layer and the S1 signalling connection exists, the MME shall retransmit the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT message or TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message.
[('a failure of the handover procedure reported by the lower layer', 'if'), ('the S1 signalling connection exists', 'if')] ----> the MME shall retransmit the TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT
>> If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with EPS update type IE indicating "periodic updating" is received by the new MME which does not have the EMM context data related to the subscription, the new MME may send the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause value #10 "Implicitly detached"
[('If the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message with EPS update type IE indicating " periodic updating " is received by the new MME which does not have the EMM context data related to the subscription', 'if')] ----> the new MME may send the TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT message with EMM cause value # 10 " Implicitly detached "
>> If the UE is not using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization, this procedure is used to establish the radio and S1 bearers when user data or signalling is to be sent.
[('If the UE is not using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if')] ----> this procedure used to establish the radio and S1 bearers when user data or signalling is to be sent
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization, this procedure can be used for UE initiated transfer of user data via the control plane.
[('If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if')] ----> this procedure can used for UE initiated transfer of user data via the control plane
>> This procedure is used when, the network has downlink signalling pending;
[('when , the network has downlink signalling pending', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE has uplink signalling pending;
[('when , the UE has uplink signalling pending', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE or the network has user data pending and the UE is in EMM-IDLE mode;
[('the UE or the network has user data pending', 'when'), ('the UE is in EMM-IDLE mode', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE is in EMM-CONNECTED mode and has a NAS signalling connection only; the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization, and it has user data pending which is to be transferred via user plane radio bearers;
[('when the UE is in EMM-CONNECTED mode', 'when'), ('when the UE has a NAS signalling connection only', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE in EMM-IDLE or EMM-CONNECTED mode has requested to perform mobile originating/terminating CS fallback or 1xCS fallback;
[('when , the UE in EMM-IDLE or EMM-CONNECTED mode has requested to perform mobile originating/terminating CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the network has downlink cdma2000® signalling pending;
[('when , the network has downlink cdma2000® signalling pending', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE has uplink cdma2000® signalling pending;
[('when , the UE has uplink cdma2000® signalling pending', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE has to request resources for ProSe direct discovery or Prose direct communication;
[('when , the UE has to request resources for ProSe direct discovery or Prose direct communication', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> This procedure is used when, the UE has to request resources for V2X communication over PC5.
[('when , the UE has to request resources for V2X communication over PC5', 'when')] ----> This procedure used
>> The service request procedure is initiated by the UE, however, for the downlink transfer of signalling, cdma2000® signalling or user data in EMM-IDLE mode, the trigger is given by the network by means of the paging procedure.
[('by means of the paging procedure', 'by')] ----> for the downlink transfer of signalling , cdma2000® signalling or user data in EMM-IDLE mode the trigger given by the network
>> The UE shall invoke the service request procedure when, the UE in EMM-IDLE mode receives a paging request using S-TMSI with CN domain indicator set to "PS" from the network;

[('when , the UE , in EMM-IDLE mode , has uplink signalling pending', 'when')] ----> The UE shall invoke the service request procedure
>> The UE shall invoke the service request procedure when, the UE in EMM-IDLE or EMM-CONNECTED mode is configured to use CS fallback and has a mobile originating CS fallback request from the upper layer;

>> The UE shall invoke the service request procedure when, the UE in EMM-IDLE mode is configured to use CS fallback and receives a paging request with CN domain indicator set to "CS", or the UE in EMM-CONNECTED mode is configured to use CS fallback and receives a CS SERVICE NOTIFICATION message;

>> If the service request cannot be accepted, the network shall return a SERVICE REJECT message to the UE including an appropriate EMM cause value.

>> Based on local policies or configurations in the MME, if the MME determines to change the periodic tracking area update timer, or if the MME determines to change the PSM usage or the value of timer T3324 in the UE for which PSM is allowed by the MME, the MME may return a SERVICE REJECT with the cause #10 "implicitly detached" to the UE.
[('the MME determines to change the PSM usage or the value of timer T3324 in the UE for which PSM is allowed by the MME', 'if')] ----> Based on local policies or configurations in the MME the MME may return a SERVICE REJECT with the cause # 10 " implicitly detached " to the UE
>> Based on local policies or configurations in the MME, if the MME determines to change the periodic tracking area update timer, or if the MME determines to change the PSM usage or the value of timer T3324 in the UE for which PSM is allowed by the MME, the MME may return a SERVICE REJECT with the cause #10 "implicitly detached" to the UE.
[('the MME determines to change the periodic tracking area update timer', 'if')] ----> Based on local policies or configurations in the MME the MME may return a SERVICE REJECT with the cause # 10 " implicitly detached " to the UE
>> Based on operator policy, if the service request procedure is rejected due to core network redirection for CIoT optimizations, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #31 "Redirection to 5GCN required".
[('if the service request procedure is rejected due to core network redirection for CIoT optimizations', 'if')] ----> Based on operator policy the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 31 " Redirection to 5GCN required
>> When the EMM cause value is #39 "CS service temporarily not available", the MME shall include a value for timer T3442 in the SERVICE REJECT message.
[('When the EMM cause value is # 39 " CS service temporarily not available "', 'when')] ----> the MME shall include a value for timer T3442 in the SERVICE REJECT message
>> If a mobile terminating CS fallback call is aborted by the network during call establishment as specified in 3GPP TS 29.118 [16A], the MME shall include the EMM cause value #39 "CS service temporarily not available" and set the value of timer T3442 to zero.
[('If a mobile terminating CS fallback call is aborted by the network during call establishment as specified in 3GPP TS 29.118 [ 16A ]', 'if')] ----> the MME shall set the value of timer T3442 to zero
>> If a mobile terminating CS fallback call is aborted by the network during call establishment as specified in 3GPP TS 29.118 [16A], the MME shall include the EMM cause value #39 "CS service temporarily not available" and set the value of timer T3442 to zero.
[('If a mobile terminating CS fallback call is aborted by the network during call establishment as specified in 3GPP TS 29.118 [ 16A ]', 'if')] ----> the MME shall include the EMM cause value # 39 " CS service temporarily not available "
>> If a service request from a UE with only LIPA PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4, depending on the service request received, the MME shall include the following EMM cause value in the SERVICE REJECT message:
[('If a service request from a UE with only LIPA PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4 , depending on the service request received', 'if')] ----> the MME shall include the following EMM cause value in the SERVICE REJECT message
>> If a service request from a UE with only remaining SIPTO at the local network PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4, depending on the service request received, the MME shall, if the service request received is due to CS fallback or 1xCS fallback, include the EMM cause value #40 "no EPS bearer context activated" in the SERVICE REJECT message;
[('If a service request from a UE with only remaining SIPTO at the local network PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4 , depending on the service request received', 'if'), ('if the service request received is due to CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the MME shall include the EMM cause value # 40 " no EPS bearer context activated " in the SERVICE REJECT message
>> If a service request from a UE with only remaining SIPTO at the local network PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4, depending on the service request received, the MME shall, if the service request received is not due to CS fallback or 1xCS fallback, abort the service request procedure and send a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE with detach type "re-attach required".
[('If a service request from a UE with only remaining SIPTO at the local network PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4 , depending on the service request received', 'if'), ('if the service request received is not due to CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the MME shall abort the service request procedure
>> If a service request from a UE with only remaining SIPTO at the local network PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4, depending on the service request received, the MME shall, if the service request received is not due to CS fallback or 1xCS fallback, abort the service request procedure and send a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE with detach type "re-attach required".
[('If a service request from a UE with only remaining SIPTO at the local network PDN connections is not accepted due to the reasons specified in subclause 5.6.1.4 , depending on the service request received', 'if'), ('if the service request received is not due to CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the MME shall send a DETACH REQUEST message to the UE with detach type " re-attach required
>> If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control', 'if')] ----> the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 22 " congestion "
>> If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to general NAS level mobility management congestion control, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
