>> In NB-S1 mode, if the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to operator determined barring, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('if the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to operator determined barring', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the network shall assign a value for back-off timer T3346
>> In NB-S1 mode, if the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to operator determined barring, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and assign a value for back-off timer T3346.
[('if the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to operator determined barring', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 22 " congestion "
>> If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e. the T3447 timer is running, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and may assign a back-off timer T3346 with the remaining time of the running T3447 timer.
[('If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e . the T3447 timer is running', 'if')] ----> the network may assign a back-off timer T3346 with the remaining time of the running T3447 timer
>> If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e. the T3447 timer is running, the network shall set the EMM cause value to #22 "congestion" and may assign a back-off timer T3346 with the remaining time of the running T3447 timer.
[('If the service request for mobile originated services is rejected due to service gap control as specified in subclause 5.3.17 i.e . the T3447 timer is running', 'if')] ----> the network shall set the EMM cause value to # 22 " congestion "
>> If the MME sends a SERVICE REJECT message upon receipt of the CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message piggybacked with the ESM DATA TRANSPORT message, if the Release assistance indication IE is not set to "No further uplink and no further downlink data transmission subsequent to the uplink data transmission is expected" in the message;
[('the MME sends a SERVICE REJECT', 'if'), ('piggybacked with the ESM DATA TRANSPORT message', 'if')] ----> if the Release assistance indication IE is not set to " No further uplink and no further downlink data transmission subsequent to the uplink data transmission expected in the message
>> If the MME sends a SERVICE REJECT message upon receipt of the CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message piggybacked with the ESM DATA TRANSPORT message, if the UE has indicated a support for the control plane data back-off timer;
[('upon receiving of the CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST', 'upon')] ----> the MME sends a SERVICE REJECT
>> On receipt of the SERVICE REJECT message, if the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED and the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt, if running.
[('if running', 'if'), ('the message contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value # 25', 'if')] ----> On receiving of the SERVICE REJECT message the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter
>> On receipt of the SERVICE REJECT message, if the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED and the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt, if running.
[('if running', 'if'), ('the message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3417 , T3417ext or T3417ext-mt
>> On receipt of the SERVICE REJECT message, if the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED and the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt, if running.
[('if running', 'if'), ('the message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> On receiving of the SERVICE REJECT message the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter
>> On receipt of the SERVICE REJECT message, if the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED and the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt, if running.
[('if running', 'if'), ('the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED', 'if')] ----> On receiving of the SERVICE REJECT message the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter
>> On receipt of the SERVICE REJECT message, if the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED and the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt, if running.
[('if running', 'if'), ('the message contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value # 25', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3417 , T3417ext or T3417ext-mt
>> On receipt of the SERVICE REJECT message, if the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED and the message is integrity protected or contains a reject cause other than EMM cause value #25, the UE shall reset the service request attempt counter, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt, if running.
[('if running', 'if'), ('the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3417 , T3417ext or T3417ext-mt
>> If the SERVICE REJECT message with EMM cause #25 or #31 was received without integrity protection, then the UE shall discard the message.
[('If the SERVICE REJECT message with EMM cause # 25 or # 31 was received without integrity protection', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall discard the message
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, GPRS update status, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number and the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI and ciphering key sequence number as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state , GPRS update status , P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number and the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI and ciphering key sequence number as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value
>> For the EMM cause value #3 or #6, if the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('if the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> For the EMM cause value # 3 or # 6 the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ]
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, GPRS update status, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state ciphering key sequence number as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback and a CS fallback cancellation request was not received, the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('the service request initiated for CS fallback', 'if'), ('a CS fallback cancellation request not received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If the UE finds a suitable GERAN or UTRAN cell, it then proceeds with the appropriate MM and CC specific procedures and the EMM sublayer shall not indicate the abort of the service request procedure to the MM sublayer.
[('If the UE finds a suitable GERAN or UTRAN cell', 'if')] ----> it then proceeds with the appropriate MM and CC specific procedures
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology.
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback and the UE has dual Rx/Tx configuration and supports enhanced 1xCS fallback, the UE shall perform a new attach procedure.
[('the service request initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if'), ('the UE has dual Rx/Tx configuration', 'if'), ('enhanced 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall perform a new attach procedure
>> If the service request was initiated for any reason other than CS fallback, 1x CS fallback or initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services, the UE shall perform a new attach procedure.
[('If the service request was initiated for any reason other than CS fallback , 1x CS fallback or initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall perform a new attach procedure
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM state as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM state as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM state as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM state as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state, GPRS update status, P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number and the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI, ciphering key sequence number and the location update attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause value #11.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state , GPRS update status , P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number and the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI , ciphering key sequence number and the location update attempt counter as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause value # 11
>> For the EMM cause value #11, if the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('if the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> For the EMM cause value # 11 the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access
>> If the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected, the UE shall memorize the current TAI was stored in the list of "forbidden tracking areas for regional provision of service" for non-integrity protected NAS reject message.
[('If the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall memorize the current TAI was stored in the list of " forbidden tracking areas for regional provision of service " for non-integrity protected NAS reject message
>> If the UE initiated service request for mobile originated CS fallback and a CS fallback cancellation request was not received, then the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('the UE initiated service request for mobile', 'if'), ('If the UE initiated service originated CS fallback', 'if'), ('a CS fallback cancellation request not received', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI, ciphering key sequence number and the location update attempt counter, and the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI , ciphering key sequence number and the location update attempt counter , and the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value
>> The UE shall store the current TAI in the list of "forbidden tracking areas for roaming" and remove the current TAI from the stored TAI list if present.
[('if present', 'if')] ----> The UE shall remove the current TAI from the stored TAI list
>> If the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected, the UE shall memorize the current TAI was stored in the list of "forbidden tracking areas for roaming" for non-integrity protected NAS reject message.
[('If the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall memorize the current TAI was stored in the list of " forbidden tracking areas for roaming " for non-integrity protected NAS reject message
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the MM parameters update status, TMSI, LAI, ciphering key sequence number and the location update attempt counter, and the GMM parameters GMM state and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the MM parameters update status , TMSI , LAI , ciphering key sequence number and the location update attempt counter , and the GMM parameters GMM state and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state, 5GS update status, 5G-GUTI, last visited registered TAI, TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters 5GMM state , 5GS update status , 5G-GUTI , last visited registered TAI , TAI list and ngKSI as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value
>> If the service request was not initiated for mobile originated CS fallback, the UE shall search for a suitable cell in another tracking area or in another location area according to 3GPP TS 36.304 [21].
[('the service request not initiated for mobile', 'if'), ('If the service request was not initiated mobile originated CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall search for a suitable cell in another tracking area or in another location area according to 3GPP TS 36.304 [ 21 ]
>> If the request was related to CS fallback, the UE shall send an indication to the MM sublayer and shall not attempt CS fallback until combined tracking area updating procedure has been successfully completed.
[('If the request was related to CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall send an indication to the MM sublayer
>> If the request was related to CS fallback, the UE shall send an indication to the MM sublayer and shall not attempt CS fallback until combined tracking area updating procedure has been successfully completed.
[('If the request was related to CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall not attempt CS fallback until combined tracking area updating procedure has been successfully completed
>> If the UE is in CS/PS mode 1 of operation with "IMS voice not available" and the request was related to CS fallback, the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology and disable the E-UTRA capability.
[('the UE is in CS/PS mode 1 of operation with " IMS voice not available "', 'if'), ('the request related to CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology and disable the E-UTRA capability
>> If the UE is in CS/PS mode 1 or CS/PS mode 2 mode of operation, the UE may provide a notification to the user or the upper layers that the CS domain is not available.
[('If the UE is in CS/PS mode 1 or CS/PS mode 2 mode of operation', 'if')] ----> the UE may provide a notification to the user or the upper layers that the CS domain is not available
>> If the request was related to 1xCS fallback, the UE shall cancel upper layer actions related to 1xCS fallback and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE.
[('If the request was related to 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE
>> If the request was related to 1xCS fallback, the UE shall cancel upper layer actions related to 1xCS fallback and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE.
[('If the request was related to 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall cancel upper layer actions related to 1x CS fallback
>> If the rejected request was not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services, the UE shall abort the service request procedure and enter state EMM-REGISTERED, and stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt if still running.
[('If the rejected request was not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services', 'if'), ('if still running', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3417 , T3417ext or T3417ext-mt
>> If the rejected request was not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services, the UE shall abort the service request procedure and enter state EMM-REGISTERED, and stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt if still running.
[('If the rejected request was not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall abort the service request procedure
>> If the rejected request was not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services, the UE shall abort the service request procedure and enter state EMM-REGISTERED, and stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt if still running.
[('If the rejected request was not for initiating a PDN connection for emergency bearer services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter state EMM-REGISTERED
>> If the SERVICE REJECT message is integrity protected, the UE shall start timer T3346 with the value provided in the T3346 value IE.
[('If the SERVICE REJECT message is integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3346 with the value provided in the T3346 value IE
>> If the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected, the UE shall start timer T3346 with a random value from the default range specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13].
[('If the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3346 with a random value from the default range specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ]
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback and a CS fallback cancellation request was not received, the UE in CS/PS mode 1 of operation shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('the service request initiated for CS fallback', 'if'), ('a CS fallback cancellation request not received', 'if')] ----> the UE in CS/PS mode 1 of operation shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback for emergency call and a CS fallback cancellation request was not received, the UE may attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('If the service request was initiated for CS fallback for emergency call and a CS fallback cancellation request was not received', 'if')] ----> the UE may attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback for emergency call, the UE may select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology.
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback for emergency call', 'if')] ----> the UE may select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> If the service request was initiated in EMM-CONNECTED mode with Control plane service type "mobile originating request" and with the "active" flag set to 1, the UE shall abort the procedure.
[('If the service request was initiated in EMM-CONNECTED mode with Control plane service type " mobile originating request " and with the " active " flag set to 1', 'if')] ----> the UE shall abort the procedure
>> If the service request procedure was initiated for an MO MMTEL voice call is started, a notification that the service request was not accepted due to congestion shall be provided to the upper layers.
[('If the service request procedure was initiated for an MO MMTEL voice call is started', 'if')] ----> a notification that the service request was not accepted due to congestion shall provided to the upper layers
>> The service request procedure is started, if still necessary, when timer T3346 expires or is stopped.
[('if still necessary', 'if'), ('when timer T3346 expires', 'when')] ----> The service request procedure started
>> The service request procedure is started, if still necessary, when timer T3346 expires or is stopped.
[('if still necessary', 'if'), ('when timer T3346 stopped', 'when')] ----> The service request procedure started
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state and GPRS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM parameters GMM state and GPRS update as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause with the same value
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall, stop timer T3448 if it is running;
[('if it is running', 'if'), ('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop timer T3448
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall, consider the transport of user data via the control plane as unsuccessful;
[('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall consider the transport of user data via the control plane as unsuccessful
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall, start timer T3448, with the value provided in the T3448 value IE if the SERVICE REJECT message is integrity protected;
[('if the SERVICE REJECT message is integrity protected', 'if'), ('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3448 with the value provided in the T3448 value IE
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall, start timer T3448, with a random value from the default range specified in table 10.2.1 if the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected.
[('if the SERVICE REJECT message is not integrity protected', 'if'), ('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3448 with a random value from the default range specified in table 10.2.1
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall, start timer T3448:
[('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3448
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is either zero or deactivated, the UE shall ignore the T3448 value IE and-	stop timer T3448 if it is running;
[('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is either zero or deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall ignore the T3448 value IE
>> If the UE is using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization and if the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message and the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated, the UE shall, consider the transport of user data via the control plane as unsuccessful.
[('the UE using EPS services with control plane CIoT EPS optimization', 'if'), ('the T3448 value IE is present in the SERVICE REJECT message', 'if'), ('the value indicates that this timer is neither zero nor deactivated', 'if')] ----> the UE shall consider the transport of user data via the control plane as unsuccessful
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters, 5GMM state and 5GS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters , 5GMM state and 5GS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 ] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value
>> If the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell where the UE has initiated the service request procedure are contained in the Allowed CSG list, the UE shall remove the entry corresponding to this CSG ID and associated PLMN identity from the Allowed CSG list.
[('If the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell where the UE has initiated the service request procedure are contained in the Allowed CSG list', 'if')] ----> the UE shall remove the entry corresponding to this CSG ID and associated PLMN identity from the Allowed CSG list
>> If the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell where the UE has initiated the service request procedure are contained in the Operator CSG list, the UE shall apply the procedures defined in 3GPP TS 23.122 [6] subclause 3.1A.
[('If the CSG ID and associated PLMN identity of the cell where the UE has initiated the service request procedure are contained in the Operator CSG list', 'if')] ----> the UE shall apply the procedures defined in 3GPP TS 23.122 [ 6 ] subclause 3.1A
>> If the UE is operating in single-registration mode, the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters, 5GMM state, and 5GS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [54] for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value.
[('If the UE is operating in single-registration mode', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition handle the 5GMM parameters , 5GMM state , and 5GS update status as specified in 3GPP TS 24.501 [ 54 for the case when the service request procedure performed over 3GPP access is rejected with the 5GMM cause with the same value
>> If the T3442 value received in the SERVICE REJECT message is not zero, the UE shall start timer T3442 and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE.
[('If the T3442 value received in the SERVICE REJECT message is not zero', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3442
>> If the T3442 value received in the SERVICE REJECT message is not zero, the UE shall start timer T3442 and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE.
[('If the T3442 value received in the SERVICE REJECT message is not zero', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.NORMAL-SERVICE
>> If the T3442 value received in the SERVICE REJECT message is zero, the UE shall not start timer T3442.
[('If the T3442 value received in the SERVICE REJECT message is zero', 'if')] ----> the UE shall not start timer T3442
>> If the service request was initiated for any reason other than CS fallback or 1x CS fallback, the UE shall perform a new attach procedure.
[('If the service request was initiated for any reason other than CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall perform a new attach procedure
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall handle the GMM state as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [13] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause value #10 "Implicitly detached".
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall handle the GMM state as specified in 3GPP TS 24.008 [ 13 ] for the case when the service request procedure is rejected with the GMM cause value # 10 " Implicitly detached "
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall in addition set the GMM state to GMM-DEREGISTERED, GPRS update status to GU2 NOT UPDATED, MM update status to U2 NOT UPDATED and shall delete the P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number, LAI, TMSI and ciphering key sequence number.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall in addition set the GMM state to GMM-DEREGISTERED
>> If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE, the UE shall in addition set the GMM state to GMM-DEREGISTERED, GPRS update status to GU2 NOT UPDATED, MM update status to U2 NOT UPDATED and shall delete the P-TMSI, P-TMSI signature, RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number, LAI, TMSI and ciphering key sequence number.
[('If A/Gb mode or Iu mode is supported by the UE', 'if')] ----> the UE shall delete the P-TMSI , P-TMSI signature , RAI and GPRS ciphering key sequence number , LAI , TMSI and ciphering key sequence number
>> In WB-S1 mode, if the service request procedure is started in response to a paging request from the network, access class barring, EAB or ACDC is not applicable.
[('if the service request procedure is started in response to a paging request from the network', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode access class barring , EAB or ACDC is not applicable
>> In NB-S1 mode, if the service request procedure is started in response to a paging request from the network, access barring is not applicable.
[('if the service request procedure is started in response to a paging request from the network', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode access barring is not applicable
>> If the trigger for the service request procedure is the response to a paging request from the network and the NAS signalling connection establishment is rejected by the network, the service request procedure shall not be started.
[('If the trigger for the service request procedure is the response to a paging request from the network and the NAS signalling connection establishment is rejected by the network', 'if')] ----> the service request procedure shall not started
>> During an implementation dependent time period, the service request procedure may be started when access for "terminating calls" is granted or upon a cell change.
[('when access for " terminating calls " is granted or upon a cell change', 'when')] ----> During an implementation dependent time period the service request procedure may started
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback and the access is barred for "mobile originating CS fallback" and the lower layer indicates "the barring is due to CSFB specific access barring information", the service request procedure shall not be started.
[('the service request initiated for CS fallback', 'if'), ('the access barred for " mobile originating CS fallback', 'if'), ('the lower layer indicates " the barring is due to CSFB specific access barring information', 'if')] ----> the service request procedure shall not started
>> The service request procedure may be started if it is still necessary, i.e. when access for "mobile originating CS fallback" is granted or because of a cell change.
[('if it is still necessary , i.e . when access for " mobile originating CS fallback " is granted or because of a cell change', 'if')] ----> The service request procedure may started
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback and a CS fallback cancellation request was not received and the access is barred for "mobile originating CS fallback" and the lower layer does not indicate "the barring is due to CSFB specific access barring information", the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('the service request initiated for CS fallback', 'if'), ('a CS fallback cancellation request not received', 'if'), ('the access barred', 'if'), ('mobile originating CS fallback', 'if'), ('the lower layer not indicate " the barring is due to CSFB specific access barring information', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback and the access is barred for "originating calls", the UE shall select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology.
[('the service request initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if'), ('the access barred for " originating calls', 'if')] ----> the UE shall select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> The service request procedure shall be started, if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for "originating calls" and if, the service request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources, and the MO MMTEL voice call is started, the MO MMTEL video call is started or the MO SMSoIP is started;
[('the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for " originating calls "', 'if'), ('the service request initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources', 'if')] ----> The service request procedure shall started
>> The service request procedure shall be started, if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for "originating calls" and if, the service request is initiated due to a mobile originated SMS over NAS or SMS over S102;
[('the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for " originating calls "', 'if'), ('the service request initiated due to a mobile originated SMS over NAS or SMS over S102', 'if')] ----> The service request procedure shall started
>> The service request procedure shall be started, if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for "originating calls" and if, the service request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources, ACDC is applicable to the request and the UE supports ACDC.
[('if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for " originating calls "', 'if'), ('if , the service request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources', 'if')] ----> ACDC is applicable to the request
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for "originating calls" and if, the service request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources, and the MO MMTEL voice call is started, the MO MMTEL video call is started or the MO SMSoIP is started;
[('if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for " originating calls "', 'if')] ----> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for "originating calls" and if, the service request is initiated due to a mobile originated SMS over NAS or SMS over S102;
[('the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for " originating calls "', 'if'), ('the service request initiated due to a mobile originated SMS over NAS or SMS over S102', 'if')] ----> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document
>> The call type used shall be per annex D of this document, if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for "originating calls" and if, the service request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources, ACDC is applicable to the request and the UE supports ACDC.
[('if the lower layer indicated the access was barred because of access class barring for " originating calls "', 'if'), ('if , the service request is initiated due to a request from upper layers for user plane radio resources', 'if')] ----> ACDC is applicable to the request
>> If access is barred for a certain ACDC category, and if the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a higher ACDC category and the UE supports ACDC, then the service request procedure shall be started.
[('access barred for a certain ACDC category', 'if'), ('the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a higher ACDC category', 'if'), ('the UE supports ACDC', 'if')] ----> then the service request procedure shall started
>> If an access request for an uncategorized application is barred due to ACDC, and if the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a certain ACDC category and the UE supports ACDC, then the service request procedure shall be started.
[('an access request for an uncategorized application barred due to ACDC', 'if'), ('the upper layers request user plane radio resources for a certain ACDC category', 'if'), ('the UE supports ACDC', 'if')] ----> then the service request procedure shall started
>> In WB-S1 mode, if access is barred for "originating calls", the service request procedure shall not be started.
[('if access is barred for " originating calls "', 'if')] ----> In WB-S1 mode the service request procedure shall not started
>> The service request procedure may be started if it is still necessary when access for "originating calls" is granted or because of a cell change.
[('if it is still necessary when access for " originating calls " is granted or because of a cell change', 'if')] ----> The service request procedure may started
>> In NB-S1 mode, if access is barred for "originating calls", the service request procedure shall not be started.
[('if access is barred for " originating calls "', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode the service request procedure shall not started
>> In NB-S1 mode, if access is barred for "originating calls", and a request for an exceptional event is received from the upper layers, then the service request procedure shall be started.
[('if access is barred for " originating calls " , and a request for an exceptional event is received from the upper layers', 'if')] ----> In NB-S1 mode then the service request procedure shall started
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback and a CS fallback cancellation request was received, the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE.
[('the service request initiated for CS fallback', 'if'), ('a CS fallback cancellation request received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback and a CS fallback cancellation request was received, the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE.
[('the service request initiated for CS fallback', 'if'), ('a CS fallback cancellation request received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall either, attempt to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology and proceed with appropriate cdma2000® 1x CS procedures.
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall either, attempt to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology and proceed with appropriate cdma2000® 1x CS procedures.
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall proceed with appropriate cdma2000® 1x CS procedures
>> If the UE fails to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology, the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE;
[('If the UE fails to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED
>> If the UE fails to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology, the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE;
[('If the UE fails to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall either, set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE, and perform cell selection according to 3GPP TS 36.304 [21].
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall either set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall either, set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE, and perform cell selection according to 3GPP TS 36.304 [21].
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall either, set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE, and perform cell selection according to 3GPP TS 36.304 [21].
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall perform cell selection according to 3GPP TS 36.304 [ 21 ]
>> If the service request was not initiated for CS fallback or 1xCS fallback, the UE shall enter state EMM-REGISTERED.
[('If the service request was not initiated for CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter state EMM-REGISTERED
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-IDLE mode in order to obtain packet services, then the EMM sublayer shall increment the service request attempt counter, abort the procedure and release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-IDLE mode in order to obtain packet services', 'if')] ----> then the EMM sublayer shall release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-IDLE mode in order to obtain packet services, then the EMM sublayer shall increment the service request attempt counter, abort the procedure and release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-IDLE mode in order to obtain packet services', 'if')] ----> then the EMM sublayer shall increment the service request attempt counter
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-IDLE mode in order to obtain packet services, then the EMM sublayer shall increment the service request attempt counter, abort the procedure and release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-IDLE mode in order to obtain packet services', 'if')] ----> then the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure
>> The service request counter shall not be incremented, if, the service request procedure is initiated to establish a PDN connection for emergency bearer services;
[('if , the service request procedure is initiated to establish a PDN connection for emergency bearer services', 'if')] ----> The service request counter shall not incremented
>> The service request counter shall not be incremented, if, the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services established;
[('if , the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services established', 'if')] ----> The service request counter shall not incremented
>> The service request counter shall not be incremented, if, the UE is a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN;
[('if , the UE is a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN', 'if')] ----> The service request counter shall not incremented
>> The service request counter shall not be incremented, if, the service request is initiated in response to paging from the network;
[('if , the service request is initiated in response to paging from the network', 'if')] ----> The service request counter shall not incremented
>> The service request counter shall not be incremented, if, the UE in NB-S1 mode is requested by the upper layer to transmit user data related to an exceptional event and the UE is allowed to use exception data reporting.
[('the UE in NB-S1 mode requested by the upper layer to transmit user data related to an exceptional event', 'if'), ('allowed to use exception data reporting', 'if'), ('the UE use exception data reporting', 'if')] ----> The service request counter shall not incremented
>> If the service request attempt counter is greater than or equal to 5, the UE shall start timer T3325.
[('If the service request attempt counter is greater than or equal to 5', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3325
>> Additionally if the service request was initiated for an "originating MMTEL voice" call type, a notification that the service request was not accepted and that timer T3325 is running shall be provided to the upper layers.
[('if the service request was initiated for an " originating MMTEL voice " call type', 'if')] ----> Additionally a notification that and that timer T3325 is running shall provided to the upper layers
>> If the service request for "originating MMTEL voice" call type was triggered while T3325 is running, a notification that the service request was not accepted and that timer T3325 is running shall be provided to the upper layers.
[('If the service request for " originating MMTEL voice " call type was triggered while T3325 is running', 'if')] ----> a notification that the service request was not accepted and that timer T3325 is running shall provided to the upper layers
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in order to obtain services other than packet services from EMM-IDLE mode, then the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure and release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in order to obtain services other than packet services from EMM-IDLE mode', 'if')] ----> then the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in order to obtain services other than packet services from EMM-IDLE mode, then the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure and release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in order to obtain services other than packet services from EMM-IDLE mode', 'if')] ----> then the EMM sublayer shall release locally any resources allocated for the service request procedure
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-CONNECTED mode, the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure and consider the service request procedure with "active" flag set or the 1xCS fallback procedure as failed.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-CONNECTED mode', 'if')] ----> the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure
>> If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-CONNECTED mode, the EMM sublayer shall abort the procedure and consider the service request procedure with "active" flag set or the 1xCS fallback procedure as failed.
[('If the UE triggered the service request procedure in EMM-CONNECTED mode', 'if')] ----> the EMM sublayer shall consider the service request procedure with " active " flag set or the 1x CS fallback procedure as failed
>> If a CS fallback cancellation request was not received, the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('If a CS fallback cancellation request was not received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If a CS fallback cancellation request was received the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE.
[('If a CS fallback cancellation request was received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED
>> If a CS fallback cancellation request was received the UE shall set the EPS update status to EU2 NOT UPDATED and enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE.
[('If a CS fallback cancellation request was received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall enter the state EMM-REGISTERED.ATTEMPTING-TO-UPDATE
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback and the UE has dual Rx/Tx configuration and supports enhanced 1xCS fallback, then upon entering EMM-IDLE mode the UE shall perform tracking area updating procedure.
[('upon entering EMM-IDLE mode', 'upon'), ('the service request initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if'), ('the UE has dual Rx/Tx configuration', 'if'), ('enhanced 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> then the UE shall perform tracking area updating procedure
>> The UE shall abort the service request procedure, stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt if running and perform the tracking area updating procedure.
[('if running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop timer T3417 , T3417ext or T3417ext-mt
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback or 1xCS fallback, and the CS fallback cancellation request was not received, the UE shall send the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message to the MME by using the existing NAS signalling connection after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure.
[('by using the existing NAS signalling connection', 'by'), ('the service request initiated for CS fallback or 1x CS fallback', 'if'), ('the CS fallback cancellation request not received', 'if')] ----> the UE shall send the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST message to the MME after the completion of the tracking area updating procedure
>> If the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED at switch off, the detach procedure shall be performed.
[('If the UE is in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED at switch off', 'if')] ----> the detach procedure shall performed
>> If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message from the network in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED, the UE shall take the following actions:
[('If the UE receives a DETACH REQUEST message from the network in state EMM-SERVICE-REQUEST-INITIATED', 'if')] ----> the UE shall take the following actions
>> If the service request was initiated for CS fallback, the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('If the service request was initiated for CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> If the UE finds a suitable GERAN or UTRAN cell, it then proceeds with the appropriate MM, CC and GMM specific procedures and the EMM sublayer shall not indicate the abort of the service request procedure to the MM sublayer.
[('If the UE finds a suitable GERAN or UTRAN cell', 'if')] ----> it then proceeds with the appropriate MM , CC and GMM specific procedures
>> If the service request was initiated for 1xCS fallback, the UE shall attempt to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology.
[('If the service request was initiated for 1x CS fallback', 'if')] ----> the UE shall attempt to select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> Additionally, if the service request was initiated for CS fallback or 1xCS fallback, but not for CS fallback for emergency call or 1xCS fallback for emergency call, the EMM sublayer shall indicate to the MM sublayer or the cdma2000® upper layers that the CS fallback or 1xCS fallback procedure has failed;
[('if the service request was initiated for CS fallback or 1x CS fallback , but not for CS fallback for emergency call or 1x CS fallback for emergency call', 'if')] ----> Additionally the EMM sublayer shall indicate to the MM sublayer or the cdma2000® upper layers that the CS fallback or 1x CS fallback procedure has failed
>> If the DETACH REQUEST message contains EMM cause #2 "IMSI unknown in HSS", the UE will follow the procedure as described below for the detach type "IMSI detach".
[('If the DETACH REQUEST message contains EMM cause # 2 " IMSI unknown in HSS "', 'if')] ----> the UE will follow the procedure as described below for the detach type " IMSI detach "
>> if the service request was initiated for SMS over NAS or CS fallback, but not for CS fallback for emergency call, the UE shall abort the service request procedure and progress the detach procedure;
[('if the service request was initiated for SMS over NAS or CS fallback , but not for CS fallback for emergency call', 'if')] ----> the UE shall progress the detach procedure
>> if the service request was initiated for SMS over NAS or CS fallback, but not for CS fallback for emergency call, the UE shall abort the service request procedure and progress the detach procedure;
[('if the service request was initiated for SMS over NAS or CS fallback , but not for CS fallback for emergency call', 'if')] ----> the UE shall abort the service request procedure
>> If the current TAI is not in the TAI list, the service request procedure shall be aborted to perform the tracking area updating procedure.
[('If the current TAI is not in the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the service request procedure shall aborted to perform the tracking area updating procedure
>> If the current TAI is still part of the TAI list, the UE shall restart the service request procedure.
[('If the current TAI is still part of the TAI list', 'if')] ----> the UE shall restart the service request procedure
>> If the lower layers indicate a failure to set up a radio bearer, the UE shall locally deactivate the EPS bearer as described in subclause 6.4.4.6.
[('If the lower layers indicate a failure to set up a radio bearer', 'if')] ----> the UE shall locally deactivate the EPS bearer as described in subclause 6.4.4.6
>> The UE shall abort the service request procedure, enter state EMM-REGISTERED, and stop timer T3417, T3417ext or T3417ext-mt if still running.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop timer T3417 , T3417ext or T3417ext-mt
>> If the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message contained the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority", the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value.
[('If the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message contained the low priority indicator set to " MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority "', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time " value
>> If the SERVICE REQUEST message was sent by a UE configured for NAS signalling low priority, the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value.
[('If the SERVICE REQUEST message was sent by a UE configured for NAS signalling low priority', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time " value
>> If the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message did not contain the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority" or if the SERVICE REQUEST message was sent by a UE not configured for NAS signalling low priority, the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN, then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value.
[('the SERVICE REQUEST message sent by a UE not configured for NAS signalling low priority', 'if')] ----> mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time " value
>> If the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message did not contain the low priority indicator set to "MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority" or if the SERVICE REQUEST message was sent by a UE not configured for NAS signalling low priority, the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN, then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time" value.
[('the EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message not contain the low priority indicator set to " MS is configured for NAS signalling low priority "', 'if')] ----> mode and the UE is not a UE configured to use AC11 – 15 in selected PLMN then the UE shall start timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time " value
>> If the service request was initiated due to a request from the SMS entity to send an SMS and timer T3246 is not running, the UE, if operating in CS/PS mode 1 of operation, may select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('If the service request was initiated due to a request from the SMS entity to send an SMS and timer T3246 is not running', 'if'), ('if operating in CS/PS mode 1 of operation', 'if')] ----> the UE may select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> The UE shall abort the service request procedure for transfer of user data via the control plane, enter state EMM-REGISTERED, and stop timer T3417 if still running.
[('if still running', 'if')] ----> The UE shall stop timer T3417
>> If the UE is operating in NB-S1 mode and does not support the timer T3448, the UE shall start the timer T3346 with the "Extended wait time CP data" value.
[('the UE operating in NB-S1 mode', 'if'), ('the UE not support the timer T3448', 'if')] ----> the UE shall start the timer T3346 with the " Extended wait time CP data " value
>> The service request procedure for transfer of user data via the control plane is started, if still necessary, when the timer T3448 expires or is stopped.
[('if still necessary', 'if'), ('when the timer T3448 expires', 'when')] ----> The service request procedure for transfer of user data via the control plane started
>> The service request procedure for transfer of user data via the control plane is started, if still necessary, when the timer T3448 expires or is stopped.
[('if still necessary', 'if'), ('when the timer T3448 stopped', 'when')] ----> The service request procedure for transfer of user data via the control plane started
>> If the UE is in EMM-IDLE mode, the UE stays in the current serving cell and applies normal cell reselection process.
[('If the UE is in EMM-IDLE mode', 'if')] ----> the UE applies normal cell reselection process
>> If the UE is in EMM-IDLE mode, the UE stays in the current serving cell and applies normal cell reselection process.
[('If the UE is in EMM-IDLE mode', 'if')] ----> the UE stays in the current serving cell
>> Upon upper layer's request for a mobile originated CS fallback which is not for emergency call, the UE in CS/PS mode 1 of operation shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[("Upon upper layer's request for a mobile originated CS fallback which is not for emergency call", 'upon')] ----> the UE in CS/PS mode 1 of operation shall attempt to select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> Upon upper layer's request for a CS fallback for emergency call, the UE may select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[("Upon upper layer's request for a CS fallback for emergency call", 'upon')] ----> the UE may select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> Upon a request from the SMS entity to send an SMS and timer T3246 is not running, the UE, if operating in CS/PS mode 1 of operation, may select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology.
[('if operating in CS/PS mode 1 of operation', 'if')] ----> Upon a request from the SMS entity to send an SMS and timer T3246 is not running the UE may select GERAN or UTRAN radio access technology
>> Upon upper layer's request for a mobile originated 1x CS fallback which is not for emergency call, the UE shall select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology.
[("Upon upper layer's request for a mobile originated 1x CS fallback which is not for emergency call", 'upon')] ----> the UE shall select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> Upon upper layer's request for a 1xCS fallback for emergency call, the UE may select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology.
[("Upon upper layer's request for a 1x CS fallback for emergency call", 'upon')] ----> the UE may select cdma2000® 1x radio access technology
>> If the service request procedure was triggered for an MO MMTEL voice call is started, a notification that the service request procedure was not initiated due to congestion shall be provided to the upper layers.
[('If the service request procedure was triggered for an MO MMTEL voice call is started', 'if')] ----> a notification that the service request procedure was not initiated due to congestion shall provided to the upper layers
>> Failure to find a suitable GERAN or UTRAN cell, after release of the NAS signalling connection without "Extended wait time" and with redirection indication received from lower layers when the service request was initiated for CS fallback
[('when the service request was initiated for CS fallback', 'when')] ----> redirection indication received from lower layers
>> The service request procedure is started, if still necessary, when timer T3447 expires.
[('when timer T3447 expires', 'when'), ('if still necessary', 'if')] ----> The service request procedure started
>> If a lower layer failure occurs before a SERVICE REJECT message has been sent to the UE or the service request procedure has been completed by the network, the network enters/stays in EMM-IDLE.
[('If a lower layer failure occurs before a SERVICE REJECT message has been sent to the UE or the service request procedure has been completed by the network', 'if')] ----> the network enters/stays in EMM-IDLE
>> If the SERVICE REQUEST, EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or the CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message is received with a protocol error, the network shall return a SERVICE REJECT message with one of the following EMM cause values:
[('If the SERVICE REQUEST , EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or the CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message is received with a protocol error', 'if')] ----> the network shall return a SERVICE REJECT message with one of the following EMM cause values
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the network shall continue with the previous service request procedure and shall not treat any further this SERVICE REQUEST, EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message.
[('If the information elements do not differ', 'if')] ----> then the network shall not treat any further this SERVICE REQUEST , EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message
>> If the information elements do not differ, then the network shall continue with the previous service request procedure and shall not treat any further this SERVICE REQUEST, EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST or CONTROL PLANE SERVICE REQUEST message.
[('If the information elements do not differ', 'if')] ----> then the network shall continue with the previous service request procedure
>> If an ATTACH REQUEST message is received and the service request procedure has not been completed or a SERVICE REJECT message has not been sent, the network may initiate the EMM common procedures, e.g. the EMM authentication procedure.
[('an ATTACH REQUEST message received', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures , e.g . the EMM authentication procedure
>> If an ATTACH REQUEST message is received and the service request procedure has not been completed or a SERVICE REJECT message has not been sent, the network may initiate the EMM common procedures, e.g. the EMM authentication procedure.
[('the service request procedure not completed', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures , e.g . the EMM authentication procedure
>> If an ATTACH REQUEST message is received and the service request procedure has not been completed or a SERVICE REJECT message has not been sent, the network may initiate the EMM common procedures, e.g. the EMM authentication procedure.
[('a SERVICE REJECT message not sent', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures , e.g . the EMM authentication procedure
>> The network may e.g. after a successful EMM authentication procedure execution, abort the service request procedure, delete the EMM context, EPS bearer contexts, if any, and progress the new ATTACH REQUEST.
[('if any', 'if')] ----> The network delete the EMM context , EPS bearer contexts
>> If a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is received and the service request procedure has not been completed or a SERVICE REJECT message has not been sent, the network may initiate the EMM common procedures, e.g. the EMM authentication procedure.
[('a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message received', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures , e.g . the EMM authentication procedure
>> If a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is received and the service request procedure has not been completed or a SERVICE REJECT message has not been sent, the network may initiate the EMM common procedures, e.g. the EMM authentication procedure.
[('a SERVICE REJECT message not sent', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures , e.g . the EMM authentication procedure
>> If a TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST message is received and the service request procedure has not been completed or a SERVICE REJECT message has not been sent, the network may initiate the EMM common procedures, e.g. the EMM authentication procedure.
[('the service request procedure not completed', 'if')] ----> the network may initiate the EMM common procedures , e.g . the EMM authentication procedure
>> If the lower layers indicate a failure to set up a radio or S1 bearer, the MME shall locally deactivate the EPS bearer as described in subclause 6.4.4.6.
[('If the lower layers indicate a failure to set up a radio or S1 bearer', 'if')] ----> the MME shall locally deactivate the EPS bearer as described in subclause 6.4.4.6
>> If the UE is not attached when it receives a paging for EPS services, the UE shall ignore the paging.
[('If the UE is not attached when it receives a paging for EPS services', 'if')] ----> the UE shall ignore the paging
>> For the UE using eDRX, the network initiates the paging procedure when NAS signalling messages, cdma2000® signalling messages or user data is pending to be sent to the UE within the paging time window.
[('when NAS signalling messages , cdma2000® signalling messages or user data is pending to be sent to the UE within the paging time window', 'when')] ----> For the UE using eDRX the network initiates the paging procedure
>> If NAS signalling messages, cdma2000® signalling messages or user data is pending to be sent to the UE outside the paging time window and the eDRX value that the network provides to the UE in the Extended DRX parameters IE during the last attach procedure or the last tracking area updating procedure is not all zeros, the network initiates the paging procedure at T time ahead of the beginning of the next paging time window.
[('If NAS signalling messages cdma2000® signalling messages or user data pending to be sent to the UE outside the paging time window and the eDRX value that the network provides to the UE in the Extended DRX parameters IE during the last attach procedure or the last tracking area updating procedure is not', 'if'), ('value that the network provides to the UE in the Extended DRX parameters IE during the last attach procedure or the last tracking area updating procedure is not all zeros', 'if')] ----> the network initiates the paging procedure at T time ahead of the beginning of the next paging time window
>> If the network starts timer T3415, the network shall set timer T3415 to a value smaller than the value of timer T3-RESPONSE.
[('If the network starts timer T3415', 'if')] ----> the network shall set timer T3415 to a value smaller than the value of timer T3-RESPONSE
>> If there is a PDN connection for emergency bearer services established, the EMM entity in the network shall not provide the list of CSG IDs to the lower layer.
[('If there is a PDN connection for emergency bearer services established', 'if')] ----> the EMM entity in the network shall not provide the list of CSG IDs to the lower layer
>> If the negotiated UE paging probability information is available in the EMM context of the UE, the EMM entity shall provide the lower layer with the negotiated UE paging probability information.
[('If the negotiated UE paging probability information is available in the EMM context of the UE', 'if')] ----> the EMM entity shall provide the lower layer with the negotiated UE paging probability information
>> Upon reception of a paging indication, if control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the UE, the UE shall stop the timer T3346, if running, and shall initiate a service request procedure to respond to the paging or a tracking area updating procedure as specified in subclauses 5.5.3.2.2 and 5.5.3.3.2.
[('Upon receiving of a paging indication', 'upon'), ('if control plane CIoT EPS optimization is not used by the UE', 'if'), ('if running', 'if')] ----> the UE shall stop the timer T3346

>> The network shall stop the timer for the paging procedure when an integrity-protected response is received from the UE and successfully integrity checked by the network or when the EMM entity in the MME receives an indication from the lower layer that it has received the S1-AP UE context resume request message as specified in 3GPP TS 36.413 [23].

>> The network shall stop the timer for the paging procedure when an integrity-protected response is received from the UE and successfully integrity checked by the network or when the EMM entity in the MME receives an indication from the lower layer that it has received the S1-AP UE context resume request message as specified in 3GPP TS 36.413 [23].
[('when an integrity-protected response successfully checked by the network', 'when')] ----> The network shall stop the timer for the paging procedure
>> The network shall stop the timer for the paging procedure when an integrity-protected response is received from the UE and successfully integrity checked by the network or when the EMM entity in the MME receives an indication from the lower layer that it has received the S1-AP UE context resume request message as specified in 3GPP TS 36.413 [23].
[('when an integrity-protected response received from the UE', 'when')] ----> The network shall stop the timer for the paging procedure
>> If the response received is not integrity protected, or the integrity check is unsuccessful, the timer for the paging procedure shall be kept running unless, the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services;

[('the response received', 'if')] ----> shall kept running unless , the UE has a PDN connection for emergency bearer services

>> If the network receives a PDN CONNECTIVITY REQUEST message with an unassigned or reserved PTI value, the network shall respond with a PDN CONNECTIVITY REJECT message including ESM cause #81 "invalid PTI value".

>> If the network receives an ESM INFORMATION RESPONSE message which includes an unassigned or reserved PTI value, the network shall ignore the message.
[('If the network receives an ESM INFORMATION RESPONSE message which includes an unassigned or reserved PTI value', 'if')] ----> the network shall ignore the message
>> If the PTI is an assigned value that does not match the PTI in use for any ongoing transaction related procedure, the network shall respond with an ESM STATUS message including ESM cause #81 "invalid PTI value".
[('If the PTI is an assigned value that does not match the PTI in use for any ongoing transaction related procedure', 'if')] ----> the network shall respond with an ESM STATUS message including ESM cause # 81 " invalid PTI value "
>> If the network receives an ESM message other than those listed in items a through e above with a reserved PTI value, the network shall ignore the message.
[('If the network receives an ESM message other than those listed in items a through e above with a reserved PTI value', 'if')] ----> the network shall ignore the message
>> If the UE receives a PDN CONNECTIVITY REJECT message in which the PTI value is an unassigned or reserved value, or an assigned value that does not match any PTI in use, the UE shall ignore the message.
[('If the UE receives a PDN CONNECTIVITY REJECT message in which the PTI value is an unassigned or reserved value , or an assigned value that does not match any PTI in use', 'if')] ----> the UE shall ignore the message
>> If the UE receives a PDN DISCONNECT REJECT message in which the PTI value is an unassigned or reserved value, or an assigned value that does not match any PTI in use, the UE shall ignore the message.
